reviews.text:
The check-in process at this hotel was a complete disappointment. The receptionist desk queue was unacceptably long, and there was no distinction between group and personal check-ins, causing even further delays. It was disappointing to see that the hotel did not prioritize guest satisfaction by employing more staff or adopting a more efficient check-in system.

Additionally, the hotel's policy of not allowing early check-ins is extremely inconvenient. This policy shows a lack of consideration for guests' schedules, which is unacceptable. As a result, we had to wait an unreasonable amount of time to check in and had no choice but to put my plans on hold.
reviews.title: Long Check-in Queue

reviews.text: We stayed for one week at the Grand Jatra Hotel Balikpapan last week.  From the very first interaction with Huda from the Hotel who collected us at the airport until the farewell when he delivered us back to catch our flight, he and all the staff were so helpful and accommodating to our needs. We are an older couple and I use a walking stick. A special mention to Fitri in the front office who took great care when we had an issue with international banking and the Indonesian phone sim. The food and coffee was good, as was the service in the bar in the evenings. The location is great with E Walk shopping centre right next door.  We had a very comfortable stay here.
reviews.title: Friendly and Helpful Staff

reviews.text: I have stayed in lots of hotels in Balikpapan. Different people have different preferences for hotels but, I recommend staying at this luxury hotel, Grand Jatra Hotel. I had never seen a five-star hotel as good as this in Balikpapan. Our stay at Grand Jatra Hotel Balikpapan was outstanding, we stayed on the sixth floor and the views above there were splendid. The parking area is spacious since it was next to the mall. The service of the hotel, which was excellent. The hotel staff was very welcoming and friendly, I had a wonderful experience at the hotel. Every staff member I encountered, from the check-in to the cleaning staff were delightful, impatient, and sincere to help me. Before I tell my little sister that the breakfast was already closed, she had run out the door. So we decided to eat at the mall. The location of the hotel is perfect, which is next to the mall. Because of that perfect location, We can easily go for food, shopping, etc. Overall it is a good hotel, but there is something that needs to be improved, for example, the WIFI connection and sometimes there are no soaps and towels.
reviews.title: grand jatra

reviews.text:
Located not so far from the airport & next to shopping malls makes this hotel popular. I stayed 1 night, arrived at Balikpapan around 10 AM. I requested for an early check in at my reservation, but they could not give me one & had to wait until 1 PM. The malls helped me to kill time while waiting. Not impressed by the staffs attitude though, when arrived there were stairs at the entrance. I only brought a carry on luggage & easily manage to get through the stairs. Sadly, the security staffs at the entrance didn't do anything to help. I understand that they can not leave their post, but at least they could call concierge staff to help guests. I don't know what the guest would do if they bring big luggage, didn't see a ramp either near the entrance. After a while came back to check if room ready & told the Front Office that I will need 1 meeting room later on. They inform me to wait for the staff who handle the reservation, so I waited for almost an hour until someone showed up. Not impressed again with the long waiting. Since we were using the meeting room, we had free buffet lunch. I think the hotel breakfast food variety was way much better than the lunch. After the meeting, I called a staff asking a box to take the leftover food from tea  break. Again, we have to wait for another hour & made a call again. 
I could not say good things about the room, I think the room was outdated & need some refurbishment as well thorough cleaning. The chair had missing buttons, there were an obvious pen or pencil marks on the wardrobe door, also some stains on the bed sheet. When I put some stuffs at my room desk, I noticed there were ants on the surface. Called housekeeping to clean the desk once again. I left the room  to take a stroll around the hotel & check their pool & gym, which both looked great. When I came back, I could see the desk area had been cleaned. But I noticed there were still some ants at the desk & night stand near the bed. This time I waited for the housekeeping staff to show the ants, & found the source from the coffe/tea tray. Thankfully, they offered me to change room. They were nice enough to upgrade the room to deluxe one, and asked me to check the room condition before they moved my luggage. I was glad that this room was ant free. They also give us a late check out for the next day.
I am sorry that I did not have a great time although I stayed only for a night at this hotel. If I had a better hotel option, probably I won't choose this place for the next time.
reviews.title: Not impressed from the 1st visit

reviews.text:
If I could describe Blue Sky Hotel in one word, it would be "Home". 

Most 4-5 star hotels are typical - you'd be greeted by warm hospitality, beautiful interior, comfortable rooms. But always sterile and lacking that personal touch.
Blue Sky Hotel manages to capture all of that as you are immediately greeted by rustic antiques at the lobby, and make you feel right at home. The overall experience is simply incomparable. 

I've been accommodated in Blue Sky Hotel for months throughout and even after the pandemic, but have never felt home sick. Everything in this hotel is top notch - especially the food!

Thank you again to the Blue Sky team for your unparalleled hospitality, I will definitely be coming back.
reviews.title: Best hotel ever!

reviews.text:
Now, I will recommend the best hotel in Balikpapan, East Kalimantan. 4 Nights, I stayed at Blue Sky Hotel Balikpapan. Did a business trip working there.

Let's start, landing at sepinggan international airport, there is a pick up team with mr. sunyoto. (free service). Then, the trip to the hotel is only 10 minutes.

Arrived at the hotel I entered the room, and felt very comfortable and full of warmth and plus a very spacious room.

The next day, I had breakfast. The food provided, from Indonesian food, western food until Japanese food. My favorite, Soto Medan and sushi!

Overall, I really enjoy all the services and facilities provided by Blue Sky Hotel Balikpapan.

Do not forget! you can must try SPA massages & pool
reviews.title: Amazing Experience & Nice Hospitality Services

reviews.text: Stay here for 10 days in quarantine requirement before onboard to the offshore vessel. Good response staff, clean room and big room. The hotel located on next of KFC and also street food along the road
reviews.title: Good Hotel

reviews.text:
Had to stay here for work for 5 weeks in a 3 month period. 

My first room was one of the older style rooms facing the road, which was a bit noisy. However the room was spotless and well maintained. My next two rooms were in the newer part. Both were spacious, clean and comfortable - one having a kitchenette and balcony. 

Food was good, but while on COVID quarantine the room service often arrived lukewarm, but given the large numbers of people ordering room service at the same time this may explain it. The only real complaint I had about the food was that when I ordered the burger, twice the burger came undercooked (raw in the middle) despite me ordering well done. However the rest of the meals were delicious, and I can recommend the food from the Japanese and Chinese on site restaurants. 

The staff were excellent and very friendly. 

I would be delighted to return to this hotel if ever in Balikpapan again.
reviews.title: A great place to stay.

reviews.text: Currently staying in The Blue Sky Hotel whilst Covid-19 quartining before joining a vessel for offshore work. Food is of a high standard. Some rooms such as mine are a little dated but other rooms are more modern. Staff are excellent, attentive and friendly.
reviews.title: Balikpapan BlueSky

reviews.text:
It's a pleasant stay during our stay at the hotel. All was fine. The room was ample enough to accommodate 2 adult and 1 child. The floor was equipped with thick carpet. The bath room equipped with bat tub so you can have a long bath in it.

The breakfast variety was good enough. From East to West menu available.

The pool available for adult and child.
reviews.title: Perfect place for family getaway

reviews.text:
Iâ€™ve stayed here twice for work and enjoyed it very much. The food in the restaurant is very good and plentiful. The rooms are comfortable and after traveling for thirty hours was just what I needed. It can be a little noisy at times , but is worth the money.
Everyone of the staff I met there are very helpful and friendly.
reviews.title: Wonderful staff

reviews.text: This hotel is a very good choice if you make a stop over in Balikpapan. It is a modern big hotel with comfortable rooms, good food, swimming pool and friendly staff. Breakfast is a buffet with a big variety of food.
reviews.title: Luxury hotel in Balikpapan

reviews.text: As a hotel with such a big name, the initial welcoming by the bellboy was not a pleasure. There was no smile, like, at all. And I'm guessing he is about 50 years old (if not more). No sign of professionalism. The check in process was a drag. It was long. The lobby is nice though, spacious, clean, the elevator is small, it only fits maybe 5 pax max. The room we stayed in is spacious, clean, and quite nice. The amenities was complete. The bathtub though, need to be replaced. There was like corroded metal in it. Check it at room 521. Didn't get a chance to report that. But please, it needs to be handled seriously. The pool is nice, the breakfast is great. The check out process, it was longer than the check in process.
reviews.title: Improvement needed

reviews.text:
I came back to Katoomba for a week long artiss workshop and stay in this surprisingly great hotel. It exceeded my expectations in every way. Comfy clean, nice breakfasts, pool. Two thumbs way up.

It was recommended by the artist who ran the workshop, was convenient to town, quiet, just generally pleasant all around. I have travelled extensively and stayed in many different hotels around the world. This met my standards and then some. A nice surprise.
reviews.title: Blue mountain surprise

reviews.text:
This Hotel is Oldschool in a good way. 
As one of the Senior hotels in Balikpapan it is easy to assume that the facilities and services would be worn out when compared to newer franchised hotels.

I have stayed in several chain hotels in this city but by far this establishment excels in terms of comfort, service and overall price comparison.
The room I was given is comfortable and clean. Hallways well lit and no smell of old hotels.

The breakfast is definitely the best. With the very diverse menu available to the friendly service of the waiters.

Checkin and checkout very easy and painless.

I never had the chance to enjoy the seafood resto or the swimming pool. But from the sheer number of people in the pool I can tell they are making full use of that facility.

Highly recommended for the sub 700rb category
reviews.title: Oldschool Services Trumps the Competition

reviews.text:
The first time I arrived, 23 August 2022 at around 11-12 AM. There was NO BELLBOY/ CONCIERGE AT ALL. There was only the female security who didn't help me with the suitcase & bags AT ALL even though she saw me babywearing my 1 y.o toddler. She didn't even intend to help or offering me a hand. She just greeted me with "pagi" & stayed at her place PLAYING CANDY CRUSH!!!! I saw with my own eyes when answering to her greeting.

The 3rd day I was here, 26 August 2022 at 08.00 AM. I was in the middle eating my breakfast, then my toddler needed to go to the bathroom. Then I asked one of the F&B waitress (again she was in her phone). I asked where the toilet was & I asked whether I can go back to the resto after I got my baby cleaned or not.. Then SHE LAUGHED & say "Bisa (laughing) Kamer Berapa?"

THIS IS HOSPITALITY BUSINESS.. YOU GUYS SHOULD REALLY IMPROVE THE MANNERS OF THE EMPLOYEES. I don't mind if I can't go back to the resto again AS LONG AS they deliver with good manners & words.

At the end I don't go back bcs It was such a mocking way to laugh the guest who asked nicely.

PLEASE IMPROVE THE SERVICE, IMMEDIATELY.
reviews.title: Bad Service of the Female Security & FB Employee

reviews.text: First of all the hotel is barely 3 star so any claims that it is more are completely false , I have stayed here on and off for around 2 years all stays have been forced upon myself and colleagues by our company . The rooms are very tired and feel very dirty with a bad smell of dampness Iâ€™ve noticed this in all rooms Iâ€™ve stayed in including what I would guess was a suite last summer . Room service menu has plenty listed on it but they donâ€™t have much of what is on the menu and the food i very poor quality. The hotel looks nice on entry but it seems this is the only area that has been kept in good standard . Given the choice this hotel is far down the list for this area having stewed in most of the hotels in the area at some point over the last few years .I have had no issues with the staff they seem helpful and it looks like they are working with what the company have given them. This is a 2-3 star hotel dressed up a little to give the impression of something better

reviews.text:
So i have many memories in this hotel, because i used to stay there often. This hotel make me happy cause the vibe when we in the hotel its different from other hotel.

This hotel is located in the center of Balikpapan City, the rooms are quite spacious, clean. In the room there is a drinking place for mineral water refill, mineral water refill dispenser is available in the room hallway, complete toileters equipment, the swimming pool is quite spacious, the waiting time there is very spacious and comfortable. The restaurant for breakfast is very spacious and in terms of taste it is still served delicious and still warm and the hotel staff is very friendly.

So I highly recommend this hotel to stay here for family and recreation. Of all the hotels in Balikpapan that I have visited, this hotel is the only one that remains in my memory because I have many memories in this hotel.
reviews.title: Best Hotel

reviews.text: Just realized this hotel is used for covid isolation, so 1 night was enough and moved to other hotel. I got information after I paid for my stay. I dont think I will stay here again till the isolation is over, even I am GOLD member of ALL

reviews.text:
When checked in I started to feel safe when I was asked to show my Covid test result before signing registration form. All staffs also wore masks and hand gloves. They also have clinic to make sure that they are ready to give medical attention and treatment to all guests. 
The room was spacious and I could get additional amenities just a call away and free.
They also gave me choices whether using water from dispenser outside or bottle inside.
The food was also good both in room service and buffet. They also applied health protocol in the restaurant. The GM usually came during breakfast to say hi to all guests.
All staffs were also friendly and helpful.
I might stay here if I have job to do around. I really apreciate their attentions for their guests by providing good service and keeping their guests healthy at the same time.
reviews.title: Safe to stay

reviews.text: Breakfast with a range of sumptuous meals, variety of tropical fruits, selections of cheeses, Japanese sushi rolls, toasted cakes and bakery plus - of course - a range of local cuisines really made some refreshed mornings amidst tight business travels. Panoramic Balikpapan's bay and Makassar straits' view from the distance height, along with oil vessels, inter-insular ships, fishermen's boats and off-shore rigs really made my days to and fro in this historic yet clean n neatly arranged city of oil refinery. Pride of all these are always within and beyond. Thanks, (was Hotel Balikpapan is now) Novotel Balikpapan.
reviews.title: A pool of delicacies amidst exhaustive business travel

reviews.text: The hotel was great, we were welcomed by excellent staff at Novotel Balikpapan.The food we enjoyed during lunch was extremely delicious (Rendang). The restaurant staffs were very friendly and welcome. The General Manager (Mr.Florent) was very kind and professional. Dinda from Guest Relation Officer was extremely attentive, professional and friendly. Her hospitality skills should be considered by Accor. She is a treasure and asset for hospitality industry. I am highly support for her next journey on BTOTY Competition in Malaysia, Indonesia and Singapore.
reviews.title: Excellent Product and Service!

reviews.text: Excellent service. Great ecological awareness (instead of plastic bottles, you get a refillable glass flask to use with water coolers in the hallway). I'd give it 5 stars if it had more consistent wifi.
reviews.title: Conveniently located and managed with a personal touch

reviews.text:
Stayed at this hotel last week and found it quite adequate for our stay. Rooms were sufficiently spacious and the aircon was in good working order. 

There is good management supervision at this hotel with the GM visiting guests at breakfast for feedback, as indeed was the case previously.

I was disappointed by the poor restaurant at The Square restaurant in the hotel. Prawn bisque was cold and tasteless and my salmon main course over cooked and cold. It was not inexpensive. It had an adjacent bar with comfortable seating. I had little time to enjoy the hotels facilities. 

Rooms were comfortable and I slept well. Wifi works well. 

If your staying here and you need to eat - just slip out of the hotel turning left - down the hill to the sea front and there is an excellent selection of bars and restaurants less then ten minutes walk away and you canâ€™t get lost.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, good location for nearby seafront restaurants

name: Swiss-Belhotel Balikpapan
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
address: Jalan Jenderal Sudirman Balikpapan Ocean Square, Pasar Baru, Balikpapan 76113 Indonesia

reviews.text:
I was lucky enough to be able to check in early at Swissbell hotel. However, despite requesting a room with a sea view, I was given a room with a view of an unsightly building. I have stayed at Swissbell numerous times before and have always enjoyed the sea views. On my latest trip, I decided to stay at Swissbell once again hoping for a sea view, but unfortunately, I did not get it. Consequently, my experience at Swissbell hotel was similar to staying at a 1-star hotel in the middle of the city.

Regarding the room condition, I believe it's time for the hotel management to replace the carpet as it emits a musty smell. Additionally, the air conditioner was leaking, causing water to seep down to the floor in front of the bathroom's door. I decided to extend my stay for one more night, but the cleaning service failed to show up to clean my room on the second day. I had to call the reception twice to get my room cleaned.

A 4-star hotel should demonstrate its quality through its service, ensuring customers have a pleasant stay.
reviews.title: Just no

owner_response.text:
Dear 727rj23,

Thank you for sharing your feedback about your recent experience at Swissbell hotel. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and disappointment you encountered during your stay. As a valued guest who has stayed with us multiple times, we understand your expectations for a room with a sea view and exceptional service.

We regret that we were unable to accommodate your request for a sea view room on this occasion. We strive to fulfill all guest preferences, but due to circumstances beyond our control, we were unable to meet your expectations in this instance. We apologize for any frustration this may have caused.

We also apologize for the issues you encountered with the room condition. We take such matters seriously, and your comments regarding the musty smell from the carpet and the leaking air conditioner have been duly noted. We will address these concerns immediately to ensure that future guests do not encounter similar problems. Your comfort and satisfaction are of utmost importance to us, and we appreciate you bringing these issues to our attention.

Regarding the cleanliness of your room and the delay in cleaning services, we apologize for the inconvenience caused. It is certainly not the level of service we aim to provide. We will investigate this matter further and take appropriate measures to prevent a recurrence. We appreciate your patience and understanding in this matter.

At Swiss-belhotel, we strive to deliver a four-star experience to all our guests, and we regret that we fell short of your expectations on this occasion. We value your loyalty as a repeat guest, and we hope that you will give us another opportunity to provide you with the exceptional service and experience that you deserve.


Once again, we apologize for the inconvenience caused and thank you for bringing these matters to our attention. We appreciate your feedback as it helps us improve our services and ensure that we meet the expectations of our valued guests.

Best Regards
Management Swiss-belhotel Balikpapan.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: I stayed in this hotel and liked it enough to return for a second stay.  The rooms were modern and comfortable, I loved the ocean view, the breakfast buffet was good, and the pool was refreshing and nicely out of the direct sun.  It has an upscale feel with many business visitors and also guests visiting for events at the hotel.  On my second visit I was given a room that unfortunately had a cigarette smell in the bathroom that was drifting into the room, and the front desk addressed the problem immediately by moving me to another room, no questions asked, which I thought was great service.  There are several very good restaurants in walking distance along the waterfront.  I would certainly stay at this hotel again.
reviews.title: upscale waterfront hotel

reviews.text:
Overall this hotel is good. Located in city center, mall and shopping center are in walking distance. Actually this hotel has mall nearby, but it was look like almost bankrupt mall. But don't worry, there is another mall located in walking distance.

Food is good, but there is no pastry for breakfast. I always found pastry in every 4 star hotel breakfast buffet menu.

For room, I stayed in room 1221. It has stunning view, but needs some repairs.
There was no reference number to call the hotel staff, even I didn't know where to order in room dining menu.

Bathroom:
Shower switch valve in bathroom didn't not work properly, it couldn't perfectly switch to shower mode. Washbowl sink needs to be changed, it drained water very slow.
Wardrobe:
The wardrobe door didn't close properly.
There was a safety box in the wardrobe but it was locked. It supposed to be opened for guest who use the room.
reviews.title: Overall is good, stunning sea view

This is not a hotel. Its Apartment suites. And a rather bad one at that.

I had booked myself at swiss belhotel and changed when I saw this on the way and now realise it was a big mistake

reviews.text:
Had to stay here a couple of nights whilst on business. 

Hotel looks good, with many facilities. I had a suite which was well equipped and spacious. However I felt that the hotel wasnâ€™t as clean and maintained as it should be. There are a lot of loose boards in the boardwalk between the reception, rooms, pool area and beach. The pool water when seen at night was cloudy and looked dirty. 

Food was good, but a lot of the fried dishes seemed to be swimming in oil when served. The tables outside the restaurant really need deep cleaned as they all felt sticky. 

The staff were really friendly and efficient, and this made my visit here. 

Despite my observations, I would still return here, as this would make a great stay if a few minor improvements made.
reviews.title: Some Highs and Lows

I was tired after long journey but when I arrived i need to wait until the room is ready. (It states earliest check in is at 2pm but I canâ€™t get my room key till 4pm) The reception isnâ€™t friendly at all, because I asked many times when the room is ready, they started to ignore me and didnâ€™t answer me. And it wasnâ€™t that, the room is dirty, less lighting (some lamps didnâ€™t work), a little water comes out from shower. This saddens me because i used to enjoy my stay at aston balikpapan, but for now i will find another hotel when I visit balikpapan again.

reviews.text:
First day I need to move another room due to ants, at another room, aircon was leaking, need 30 minutes to be fixed and cleaned. Fortunately, they follow up the complain and fix the problem, although it was 10 PM. I stayed for 5 days. 
Next day I took dinner at the restaurant, and met Dinda, who in charged in teh restaurant. she is the best, very friendly, can recommended the food, I took dinner there everyday and served by her. And she is the only one I can found that smile and greet me. She is the best asset of the hotel.
Breakfast to crowded, better to take early or late hour. The taste so standard, dinner's one still better.
Actually I believe this is supposed to be nice hotel, if it maintained properly and periodically. And this hotel is the best option, if you are looking big room, big sofa, dinner table, and with kitchen set.
Aston hotel also support B'Green, I took some photos for my B'Green collection
Hopefully Aston can fixed it and I will come back when it's better.
reviews.title: Hate but finally enjoy

reviews.text: I stayed for 2 days in two bedroom apartment, 3 adults and 1 children under 6 y.o. The first day there was no complaint.. I've accepted the lousy elevator and prefered to take the stairs, luckily my room was one floor away from the lobby. Breakfast was good and generous and there was no problem at all. But the second day the the waitress want to charge my under 6 y.o son who barely ate anything an extra charge. So I paid her double charge to cover my son' s yesterday breakfast, I told her that I didn't want my son was considered an illegal occupant in the hotel. But that was a BIG TURN OFF...
reviews.title: Breakfast extra charge for under 6 y.o child

reviews.text:
I stayed for one night, Executive room, with 2 bed rooms. It is apartment style with living room and kitchen complete with electric stove, plate, pot and water gallon

Check in 13 December 2019. It was my hubby's birth day. We got small cake and greetings on it.

Positive: 1. Very spacious 2. Sea and City view 3. Strategic location 4. Nice Breakfast, lots of menu choice

Negative: Kitchen staff a bit late to prepare ready table and late to clean up dirty table. And also late to prepare ready menu. The guest is waiting.
reviews.title: Best Strategic Hotel in Town

photos.caption: Outside room view during clear sky

reviews.text:
Got 1st impression from ocean view once you entered the Lobby. Room was prepared in 20th floor. Made me worried since 1 lift was not working at that moment. The lift itself so tiny and without AC.
The room is acceptable. It was rain in the night and found the next morning water leaking from the AC
reviews.title: Trial visit

reviews.text:
I realized that we stayed here during a very busy weekend, and therefore did expect some shortcomings, but this hotel just so so so lack maintenance. 

Elevator
Only 1 guest elevator was working when we arrived and the overload sensor alarm went off when there were more than 5 people in the elevator (capacity said 1000kg and there was ample room for more people). Because the elevator can only carry so few at a time, the queue was horrible. Waited for almost an hour then decided to just take the emergency stairs to our rooms. Later in the evening the second elevator was usable but same case, overload sensor did not let more than 5 people on it. 

Room and extra bed
We booked 1 executive and 2 superior rooms. Rooms are spacious and have great views but rather dirty and smells old. We paid for an extra bed, which turned out to be just a mattress without any kind of frame, just a mattress on the floor. When asked, the reply was extra bed standard is different in every hotel and this was how it is in Aston Balikpapan. Tried to reconfirm it at check out, yes that was indeed the standard extra bed. 

I mentioned earlier we understand it was a busy weekend. I am not going to nitpick at other services that iâ€™m sure they deliver better under normal circumstances. But overall it was a very unpleasant stay
reviews.title: Never again

reviews.text: I stayed at Aston Hotel for 9 days for work and business. First i had a problem when i checked in, the receptionist said the room wasnt ready while it was actually 11 PM, which is far from the check in time agreement. Apart from that, on my first day my room wasnt cleaned well, because the floor was still full of dust and hair and smells bad. The foods were mostly okay and the chef was nice, but I found larva in my juice and and insects in my mineral water. I also had a problem when i had my meeting because the banquet team wasnt present near my meeting room, so my event became a little bit late because i had a problem with my microphone and projector. I also needed to go out of my meeting room and searched for the banquet team for almost half an hour. I am seriously not recommending this hotel if you want to stay in Balikpapan. WORST HOTEL EVER AND THE SERVICE IS LIKE 2 STARS HOTEL INSTEAD OF 4.
reviews.title: The worst Aston Hotel that I have ever been to

reviews.text:
The photos say it all - not sure how this hotel is able to survive with all the myriad of problems it has. Where do I begin - water faucets in shower that falls off ; leaky ceiling; mould  all over the bathrooms ; stains on walls and itchy sofa; rooms that smell of smoke ; threadbare towels ; terrible service that leaves only one towel in a 2-bedroom apartment with 3 occupants.

The icing on the cake - nail in my morning breakfast pancake. Thought it was a piece of clove but turned out to be a rusty piece of tiny nail, which with a faster eater would have ended up tearing a gash in oneâ€™s oesophagus. Or living in your stomach causing untold problems. 

Oh, did I mention the aircon are super noisy and the water dispenser, really dirty ? The source of water in the dispenser is suspect so suggest you get your own water outside of the hotel. 

Needless to say this has been my worst hotel stay ever. Please for your own health stay elsewhere.
reviews.title: Worst hotel - nails in my food

We hope you will back again and give us another try to show the best of our service. Regards, Ketut Kartika - General Manager

reviews.text:
What a excellent experience stay at Grand Tjokro Balikpapan!
Superb service especially Mas Febri (Front Office). Fast check in and check out, explain all hotel facility's, and very helpfull. Good job and keep up the good work!
reviews.title: Excellent stay at Tjokro Balikpapan

reviews.text:
Stay here for one night only with family (2 adults and 2 kids), we were expecting that this hotel is still in good shape and performance, but you can't expect too much. 

The security guard was very attentive to helping our bags. The lobby is quite spacious with wooden ornament, and the Receptionist looks fresh but very quiet. No small talk, just asking about the reservation and disclaimer, fine for smoking in a non-smoking room, fine if the keycard is lost, etc. 

I only get 1 key, going up to the room (connecting room), and voila! The room is narrow and looks poor. The sheer curtain has torn, and I took the picture as proof to show them it was torn the first time, not because of my toddlers. 
Connecting door latch looks like a public toilet kind of latch. How come, the 4-star hotel uses this latch model in their connecting doors???
 
Then I asked for one more key, they give me the bad condition one, it's not supposed to give to the guest anymore. It has split in two but they held it together with cello tape. It crossed my mind to just throw it on purpose because the key is really not suitable for guests.

The bathroom is narrow, and the bath towels are very poor! So many stains on it. The only way you can differ between the bath towels and the bathmat is the size.

View from the room is a half-plane runway and half zinc roof, very unattractive. TV channels are not clean, unenjoyable bed, the carpet needs to replace, please. It's all worn. 
My best comment would be to the AC, hotels cold! 

The breakfast experience was not very memorable. No greeter who usually asked for your room number, Resto was spacious but looked empty. The food stall was so-so, but the waffle was tasty! 
They only served one egg for one portion of sunny-side-up (two eggs usually in other hotels).
The Staff was just busy doing their stuff, no communication with the guests, no offers, no chit-chat, making my husband and I wondered 'this restaurant might have just been hit by a zombie attack?'. Very quiet. No cheerful or friendly atmosphere. 

The swimming pool is nice and shady with plants and trees surrounding, fit for you and your kids during afternoon or morning swim. 

This hotel is just 6 years old but very disappointed. The Hotel Management really needs to do recovery.
reviews.title: Below your Expectations

reviews.text: This hotel is just 10-15 minutes from the airport but below-standard managed. The towels and bedsheets are so smelly even after we requested a change, that means overall hygiene management is poor. They are also not ready to follow covid-19 hygiene protocol, among others, breakfast is still on open buffet style. I don't think I need to elaborate more.
reviews.title: Very Near the Airport but Stuffy and Smelly.

reviews.text: Nice experiences when 1st time visit Balikpapan. The location is near Airport and also having shuttle which can drop off the guests make it easier. The foods are also nice, the staffs are also so helpful. Thank you...
reviews.title: Great!

reviews.text:
The staff here tried to be friendly but were not attentive enough. We made some requests but not followed through. For example, the dimmer curtains were not able to be pulled tightly closed and daylight came through which interrupted sleep. The curtain railings were jammed and told the front desk about it, but no one came to address the problem.

The linen sheets smelled funky. I had to give it a few sprays of cologne to hide the smell.  The bathroom shampoo dispenser was nearly empty and noone came to top up. The toilet bowl was icky. Had stains in it, it didnt appeared to be cleaned properly.  

Quarantine meals were a big let down. The portions were very small. I would say kid-sized meals which hardly was enough for an adult. Very likely you will need to supplement by delivery orders.  

Internet was another letdown. The Internet in the room was unstable and lagged a lot. So, video calls over WhatsApp or such were of poor quality. The hotel really needs to sort this out.  After all this, It would seem giving it a 3 star out of 5 appears generous. I only gave it 3 stars because i had to endure only 3 nights stay. If it was longer...
reviews.title: Business stay. 3 days while observing quarantine.

reviews.text:
I stayed at this hotel for four nights, and it was a nice and comfortable stay. I initially booked for a superior room, but a very kind young man named Pebry kindly assisted us for a more wonderful staying experience in this hotel.
I found the room was nice, although it is lack of the promised facilities (mini refrogerator and minibar). Another minor disturbance is a non-functioning power plug near a bed, where it seems that have been blocked by something. But that's not a major issue

Some tips prior to staying here:
-If you are landing in Sepinggan Airport and want to head directly to the hotel, don't forget to call the reception for a free airport transfer. It's a great deal, as it will save you from 70k rupiah of 5 min taxi trip. You can also order a free airport transfer going from hotel to the airport
-You're going to be asked for 100k rupiah for a deposit for your key card. Don't forget to ask for a refund upon checking out

reviews.text:
Great hotel for avgeek and planespotters! The location is near with Balikpapan Sepinggan Airport and has an awesome view of the mentioned airport runway and also with sea-view too. You can take both planes and ships photos.

For taking airplane photos, at least 55mm lens is required. But it's more recommended to use lens focal length more than 100mm depending on how far and how big the aircraft (Twin Otter or another small propeller aircraft photo need at least >200mm focal length). Turn off your air conditioner or set it at ~24Â°C if you want to take photos from windows, because the windows could become hazy if your room temperature too low and it takes quite time for the haze to disappear!

Please note that you should ask hotel receptionist to reserve you a room with Runway view, which i recommends you to take room on 4th floor since it's the highest floor available. You should try contact them directly via phone some days before your stay, and follow up your special request two and one day before your stay.

Normally the hotel started check-in time at 2pm, but if your desired room is available you can check-in early starting at 10am without any additional charge. For late check-out there is a charge that costs 25% from basic rate until 2/3pm if i'm not mistaken. 

Also, they offer free airport pick-up and drop-off service. For pick-up service, you should contact them in advance directly via phone at least one day before your stay.

The bad thing is : 
- Wi-Fi connection is unforgivably slow, especially for 4-stars hotel standard. I have been staying on several much cheaper backpacker hostels both in Indonesia and abroad, and they have much better internet connection. Try using your phone tethering feature since internet connection from your mobile provider may more reliable than the hotel's Wi-Fi.
- Please note that there is a minimum IDR 100.000,- refundable deposit required if you're paying using cash.
- Maybe just my taste but in my opinion, the breakfast menu taste is quite plain. The good thing is there are a lot of options for your breakfast in this hotel.
reviews.title: Exceptionally great hotel for Aviation geeks and lovers!

reviews.text:
We stayed here just for a night to celebrate my husband's birthday only but the services were excellent. 
From the room, it's quite spacious, clean, complete with complete toiletries and bar complimentary (water in bottles, tea, coffee, sugar, general stuff), couple slippers and towels. 
We also had dinner in room last night. We ordered Sop Buntut and Fried Rice. It was nice, not that perfect as its not that hot when served but the taste is good.
The breakfast service was great too. They had various types of food from Indonesian to western.
The best was the hospitality of the staffs. 
From check in counter service, restaurant service, and even one of the staffs, ms Tasya was so helpful and kindly prepared my special request to give birthday surprise for my husband.
Overall, today was one of my best moments staying at Hotels in Balikpapan, especially with Platinum Hotel.
Thank you
reviews.title: Birthday Staycation plus Honeymoon

reviews.text:
The room was clean. 
Hotel staffs were very friendly.
The check in process was fast as well as the check out. Really appreciate it.
The bathroom amenities were more than enough. 
Towels were clean (like it).
Water pressure and the shower was a little bit low (was in room 327).
The laundry was good and clean (would be great if the hotel provided laundry bag. It was not available on My trip)
Small notes on the swimming pool,  found used mask leaved on the swimming pool chair / table (quite annoying) - there was no crew on duty (twice visit the swimming pool).

Overall, it was a great stay in this hotel. See you around.
reviews.title: Great Clean-Comfy Hotel and Very Nice Staff

Twin Standard

Room : The size is okay with separate shower and closet. Also a 24 inch TV a bit too small. The bed is comfortable, other than that standard.
Scenery : not much to see other than roads and nearby small houses
Breakfast : not many choices, around 5 dish with a soup, toast with 3 jams choice, a little salad bar and traditional food.
WiFi : Sometimes dropped but has decent speed up to 20 Mbps
Price : Compared to other hotel budget is quite good in terms of location
reviews.title: Good in terms of location and budget

reviews.text:
Location : Good location, in the city center, easy access to airport, dining place, etc. 
Room : I stayed at their single room for 1 night. The room was quite small but OK. Quite clean and tidy. Unfortunately, when I stayed there I found out that the free mineral water were already opened. It seems that when the housekeeping clean up the room, they forgot to replace it with the new one. 
A little bit mess at the bathroom, since the shower area have almost the same level as the closet and sink, so it will leave a mess after we're taking a shower. Maybe they can put a little bit more barrier so water from the shower will not run to the other area. 
Staffs : The staffs were great! From the security guard, front desk, and all the attendants were helpful, friendly, and warm. 
Breakfast : Very basic. Need more variety. But the service was helpful and great!
reviews.title: One night only

reviews.text:
I was here in the hotel around end of October. Too bad I only stayed for one night, but based on my almost two days and one night stay, I can tell this is nice hotel in Balikpapan. I've seen better but compare to what I have experienced, this hotel is definitely worth your budget and yet give you some advantages. 

lets start from some plus point experienced from my stay :fantastic location!!! close to the airport and shopping centers. I stayed in the 6th floor and I feel pleased with my room,even it wasnt big enough like what I expected but it is nice and comfy too (so Thumbs up for this), The aircon is great and working nicely, the waters running so well both hot and cold, the Front staffs were great in during my check in and check out, they help me in suggesing places to buy some souvenirs and where to go during my short stay.

the Cons : the restaurant was an empty meeting room which function as moving restaurant (I think so), breakfast did not have many choices and to be honest was little bland. The Wifi connection was okay, both of breakfast service and wifi were just okay and i have experienced better on the other same budget or class.

despite the cons I mentioned, this hotel is surely recommend! I highly want to stay again in this hotel again if i have to come to Balikpapan again. keep up the good work WhizPrime.
reviews.title: Nice Location!

reviews.text:
So it seems it is customary in this city to put anyone first on Twin Bed Room. It doesn't matter whether you check in earlier like we do or later. They'll find any excuse to put you on Twin Bed Room. 
So fight your way to Single Queen or King Bed Size and Goodluck.
Hence we've got Twin Size Bed. And i'm happen to be on a poor maintenance bed. Looks like they rarely make up less used bed. I have no idea for how many years the bed isn't been touch. All i know the next morning i woke up with red rashes all over my back and neck.
And it's true the key system doesn't work. Hence some other guess could still get into your room with their key.
Totally a let down.

reviews.text:
I quite liked this place, It was a last minute booking due to missing the transport out so I expected the price to be boosted a bit which it was slightly . Now I am not sure how it works but I had the excess refunded the next morning without asking for it which was nice. The room is clean and tidy and smelled fresh. The bathroom layout is a little unusual but perfectly functional and again very clean. Towels were adequate and bedding clean. 
I didn't think much of the breakfast but then I can say the same for every budget hotel in this neck of the woods so toast and jam is probably what you'll end up with and there's plenty of that. So all told, a quiet night, low cost and much nicer than some of the older damp places around.

reviews.text: Donâ€™t judge the book from the covers, even tough looked from outside the hotels facade is shop house base but inside is so grand and comfortable. With ceiling to floor windows and wall to wall carpet. The hotels not newly built but still maintain international standards. The room not too narrow, very cooled centralized air con, complete with refrigerator and mini bar, soundproof, and plenty world wide tv channels. The bathroom still ok, hot water, shower, and amenities. Spa facilities and bar restaurant lounge available. Awesome breakfast with various delicious menu. Strategic Location, near from airport and my Balikpapan office, spot on protocol Street. Thanks to hospitality and helpful front office staff; vania and melissa that fullfill my request high floor, double bed, little bit sea view, late checkout and smoking room. No doubt why my colleagues always choose this best of the best economy hotels when run overnight in bpn. Highly recommend.
reviews.title: Best of the best economy hotels

reviews.text:
We stopped by for a night in this hotel and booked a Grand Deluxe Room at level 3. Our room located in the front side of the building facing the street and the ocean. It was a luxurious room, very clean, and perfect. Wide bathroom equipped with bathub, hair drier, and full packed toiletteries including shaving kit which rarely find in another hotel. We ordered Kwetiau and Spicy Tofu for dinner, the service was quick, but I don't think it was fresh meal. And the Kwetiau just tasted like Fettucini with oriental touch. 

The nxt morning, we went down for breakfast at 7.30 am and the restaurant was full, only three tables left and were at smoking area. I think you need more space and tables for the restaurant.  Wide variation of menu, fresh salad, porridge, and local cuisines. I tried Lontong Sayur and again, tasted like it has been cooked for a week ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚. You guys really need an improvement for food. 

So, 5 stars for room and hospitality, 2.5 stars for food.
reviews.title: A Lovely Room

hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text: The bed is terrible, cannot sleep and take proper rest. The Aircon Water leaking inside the room and the first day I slept with leaking water. The next day they changed my room and it's the same. Finally, I changed my hotel. The food is super expensive. I am really felt stressed during my stay in this hotel. The bathtub sliding door is nearly falling down during taking the shower.
reviews.title: Very Bad Experiance, worst tahn the budget hotel

reviews.text: This hotel seems older than the others since it had built when my parents haven't met each other but, I still think that this is one of the best choices for you guys to stay in Balikpapan. My experience staying in this hotel was quite fun since as you enter the lobby it seems so spacious and quiet even though the lobby is directly connected to the bar. The room of this hotel is really cozy and the room service is polite because they always smile and greet as we see each other and they also helped me carry luggage when I was already at the bar. I can do many kinds of sports here which is swimming and also, they have a gym. The last thing that I want to recommend is the restaurant which is the Skybar. There are plenty varieties of food which is available here and the best of this bar is the location which is a few levels above the bar and it is outdoor.
reviews.title: Amazing hotel

reviews.text:
got there and was impressed at how nice it was.  looked like something out of a movie set !

greeted very nicely and took my luggage in.  front desk staff very  polite, smiling, happy people !

just felt like i was home.  They brought my bags up to the room and i knew i was at the place to be in Balikpapan.  

room was, bright, CLEAN AND NICE !!

The room has good wifi and for me after coming from a place with no ac, and no hot water it was like being in heaven ðŸ˜ðŸ˜ðŸ‘.

i was leaving the room when my ipad pinged with a message so i stopped outside the door to check it when 2 polite young ladies from staff were walking by a d asked if everything was ok.  i told them just checking messages and they said if i needed anything to please let them know.

that was a first !  added to my great first impressions.

i decided to go have a beer in the lounge.

again like a movie set from years ago in the time when hotels like this were for the rich, famous or important people.

another reviewer mentioned the hotel is old, which it is but the difference between this hotel and another hotel here is THIS PLACE IS CARED FOR AND IT SHOWS !

Ordered a beer and since i was only person there i chatted with the Bartender Miss Feby.  very polite sweet young lady and another young man also.  was showing them some photos of my travels and home and next thing i knew it was like i was holding court.  many of staff and gathered around and i was surrounded by new friends.

some other guest had come and sat in the lounge and the waiter stopped talking and went right over to them and when Miss Feby got the order she aslo stopped talking and made the order.  Just as it should be.

then another young lady walked out and started talking and introduced here self as from food and beverage sales.
Miss Marzsa Noer Larasati.  

as much as i hated to leave she brought me up and showed me 
the skybar.  i had no idea it existed.  we talked anout many
 things and you could see in the way she carried herself and spoke she was a professional in her job.

she promotes events for the hotel and she gave me her business card and explained her job.  she makes sure everything in restaurant and bars is perfect for the guest.

they have many different events and she shared her whatsapp with me and the phots show this is not just a nice hotel but a fun place to be for all ages in Balikpapan. 

sadly i had a dinner engagement out with friends a d had to excuse myself.  very hard to leave this young lady.  her attitude about her job and life was amazing.  she will have not just a great career but great life also.
the next morning I had a 6:45 AM flight and my ride was supposed to pick me up at 4:30 but never showed and the guy who ran my tour was constantly checking with me to see if his driver arrived and i was pacing back and forth and the staff asked if i needed help and when i explained my predicament they got their phones out and got me a grab car to airport a d when it arrived they grabbed my bags and put them in the car for me.  

thanks guys for your help.  made flight thanks to you !

i urge all of you to talk with the staff when you go to different places.  everyone has a story to tell and is happy to share it all around the world.  you learn thing not only about the place you are staying but places in towns you do not know about as well as making new friends and to me thats why i always enjoy meeting people.
reviews.title: Great place and fantastic staff

reviews.text:
The room itself was quite dirty,the walls,the floor, the tables, Nothing had been properly cleaned for long time and particularly the bathroom.Also de toilets in the bar were extremely filhty.There was a constant mould damp smell in the entire room that gave me a head ache after the first night,and a very itchy skin. 
I complained to reception  but the girls didn't seem to understand english,I said I wanted to leave ,that I'd prefer to be in the jungle, then the manager over heard us and came over singsonging "jungle,jungle" and told me , I quote, "Sir you can leave any time you want,but you are not getting a refund because that's the rule,you didn't pay us,you paid the agent".
I pointed out that the room wasn't up to a 5 star hotel standards but he kept repeating that.
With a smirk on his face,I might add.

The first morning,
housekeeping staff woke me up ringing the room bell several times to clean the room,it was 08:20a.m. I asked them not to do that as I was sleeping and it was way too early. 
Nevertheless, they did it a few more times during my stay.
Another morning,at almost 09:00a.m. some maintenance was taking place in the next room because I was woken up again but this time with hammering noises.
reviews.title: Horrible experience

reviews.text: I have been all around the area and found this the best place to stay. It proved to be a great base for everything I needed and wanted to do in Balikpapan and around it. I liked that it is strategically perched on the hill overlooking the city and the strait, and that it is at the crossroads with easy access to the sights in all the directions. In my opinion, those hotels nearby, even the newer ones, are not as spacious and definitely not as charming as this classy and stylish Gran Senyiur. I was impressed with hotel's amenities and facilities that any business or tourism traveler may need. The WiFi worked great in the room and everywhere around the hotel. Everything is very accessible and comfortable: the gym, the pool, the spa, the restaurants, the bars. The breakfast is diverse and delicious, just wish I left more space for the yummy local deserts served there. I had some lunches and other meals at the hotel and they were memorably tasty. No real surprise, but everyone, from the front desk to the manager, was genuinely welcoming and helpful. There are nice seafood restraints nearby, by the shoreline, but I am happy I went to the nightly gig at the hotel by LasMorado band, the four super-talented and friendly musicians, in the Sky Bar upstairs, which is also a great place to catch a fantastically refreshing breeze and enjoy breathtaking views, with a choice of drink and food. Thank you Gran Senyiur. I will plan to stay here again on my next visit to East Kalimantan.
reviews.title: Excellent and affordable, a real deal and good memories

reviews.text:
Hotel Gran Senyur was ok . Altho old . 
Wifi is available on every floor. But very unstable . No  hand rail for handicapped person in bathroom . No handheld shower either. Room was big enough for an extra bed. Fridge was cold n was able to make ice cubes. Great! 
Breakfast was good. 
Staff were all very friendly n helpful n polite. 
Location was just right. Near to many restaurants. 
Luckily there were enough lifts . So did not have to wait long to go back to our room. 
We went to Samarinda hoping to visit the Dayak village. Unfortunately they were in mourning as one of them just died. 
For Dayak ceremony are held on Sunday morning only.
reviews.title: Congress m holiday

reviews.text:
Will prefer other newer hotel with same price range in balikpapan
1.old hotel and room .. took executive suite.. definitly rarely cleaned because hardly occupied
2. Facilities with poor condition : gym have some equipment but in Basement level..spooky corner ..should relocate it somewhere elelse
3. Pool : pictures are deceiving...it is a small L shape pool.. around 20m length
4. Disappointing breakfast selection
5. Access to location : easy ... no additional extra like beach ... ..
6. EXTRA POORwifi connection
7. Staff are friendly ..standard for  Indonesian's hospitality level
reviews.title: Old hotel need to improve

reviews.text:
The decline in the local economy (oil business has left) is reflected in this hotel. Old fashioned  seventies 'gradeur' without upkeep. Few guests do patronise this venue nowadays, apart from government and army bobo's. 
The restaurants are empty, the rooms are spacious, the staff can't help the delapidation.
But what is your alternative in Balikpapan nowadays?
reviews.title: Might have been 'Gran' in the past

reviews.text: I stayed at the Gran Senyiur for work and enjoyed the atmosphere of the hotel. As well upreviously mentioned the rooms are large and the hotel looks fantastic but age is catching up with the hotel. The en-suite was good but the shower was slow to drain, the bed was firm but good, the AC worked well in the room and the sheets and towels were clean and replaced as required. I found the internet wifi slow and very intermittent which might sound trivial but is so important these days! Overall I enjoyed my stay and found the staff wonderful and welcoming! Terima kasih!!
reviews.title: Old world charm in Balikpapan.

reviews.text:
The entrance to this hotel and the decor all portray colonial opulence. Complete with Car & Motor Bike by the lifts! But as you scratch the surface, like the exterior of the building itself itâ€™s all false and showing itâ€™s age - that canâ€™t be forgiven because it is really old.

Rooms are a fair size & well stocked for amenities, but thatâ€™s what youâ€™d expect for a 5*- carpets are tired, bathroom has had more holes drilled & filled then tiles should. Sealant is discolored and moldy. 

Breakfast was a fair selection of International & Ethnic - but not vast.

Restaurant carried the same air of aging as the rooms.

I didnâ€™t see any other 4*/5* to compare it with to say if itâ€™s better than other choices. Itâ€™s functional, safe, basically clean with a feeling of old colonial. 

Donâ€™t expect much more.
reviews.title: Grand but tired

reviews.text: Great hotels with classic interiors, well managed services, make us rest in comfort and relax stay for business. Plus, the taste of breakfast it so tasty in our tongue, make it back memory original taste of the food itself. Very recommended for every occation
reviews.title: Great and classy

reviews.text: The architecture of this hotel was built in the golden age of wood in Borneo. Not a newly built modern hotel, equipped with spacious rooms, but will be very interesting for the architecture observers.
reviews.title: Architecture of a hotel in the golden age of wood

reviews.text:
The Hotel looks and feels like it is 100 years old, the rooms are very generous.
I only spent a short nights stay, I arrived very late and left very early in the morning.
I found the staff very friendly, 
I used the airport Bus and it was great.
I would not rate this hotel more than 3 stars.
The night staff, spoke English but very limited, this made it quite difficult to confirm the details of the Airport BUS,
reviews.title: Short 1 Night Stay

reviews.text:
This hotel shown that it had a glamorous and luxury symbol of the past. But now much attention need to be addressed on the interior and rooms.

Water flow from bathroom sink was very small, hot water was not warm enough. Aircon was not cold and mattress need to be replaced.

Room service and food quality were good.

Plenty selection on breakfast. Marvelous breakfast room.

Hoping that someone will bring back this hotel to its glorious past.
reviews.title: Past time Grandeur in needs of renovation

reviews.text:
Friendly staff. Big and clean rooms. View OK. Bed is comfortable. Location good. 20 minutes and 70K Rupiah from airport. Buffet breakfast OK. AC is OK. You can walk to the main street for food stalls, shops and restaurants.

Bathroom can be improved. Was clean, but toilet kept flowing.

TV works, but is not all channels are setup OK. But that is often the case in Indonesia.

We made the mistake of using the hotel transport service for a very short trip. The driver tried to overcharge us and was not very polite. So, do not use.

ATM close to the hotel. 

I would use this hotel again.
reviews.title: Fine hotel, avoid hotel shuttle transport

reviews.text: I am impressed by how big the room was for having a standard room. It has old-fashioned style decoration, one may think it's tacky but one may say it's classic. I was told it is the most luxurious hotel in town. The meeting room was spacious, although the service boy was not very fast in response to technical problem. The breakfast is good, but for 5 stars hotel it is a bit overrated. The swimming pool opens at 7am and closes at 6pm. So basically if you have full-day meeting, you can't swim. But overall it is not bad, and the reception is very helpful and friendly.

Being an excellent location, I have to say that this hotel is getting worse in their services. During check out they are really trying to hurry me sign the final bill. I have to raise my voice a bit before the lady finally allow me to check the bill. My suspicion was correct the room charge is mistaken. Funny things is the staff cannot rectify the bill, and I chose not to sign something that is incorrect. They said that I have to wait for their Manager who is coming to the hotel around 9 a.m, I am not going to do it as I have a plane to board. They did promise me to send me a copy of my bill to my email which they did with poor quality images. Almost nothing can be seen from the pictures.

Isn't the hotel suppose to have an Manager On Duty to handle this sort of stuff? and come on what so called Managers...please arrive a bit early.

I regret to let you know Mr. General Manager...that was the last time I stayed in your hotel and will be my last. I will never stay there anymore let alone recommend this hotel to my guests who are visiting Balikpapan. 

Great location + Poor services = Lose Customers!

Dear Mrs. Syafira Putri,

reviews.text:
Staying for less than 24 hours in Balikpapan, I choose this hotel mainly because of the location directly opposite Balikpapan Trade Center (BTC) or also known as Balikpapan Plaza. The excellent location helps you to do your shopping and back to the hotel for little bit of rest and then continue again. It gives you the whole new meaning to Shop till you drop or shop till you broke :-)

Anyway, despite the excellent location I have to agree with some other reviewer that this hotel need to be refurbished again. Staying in their Deluxe room on the fifth floor provide me with less noise from the night club. LCD TV and Separate Air Conditioner system run perfectly to keep you comfort. 

Breakfast as usual is Okay, nothing special but perhaps the restaurant attendance need to keep an eye of the amount of food. When I am doing my breakfast, the food is finished and took a while for someone to replenish the empty serving dish. 

The bellboy and the housekeeping is ready at time notice to help you with the luggage.

Overall, with such a short time in town I have nothing much to complain about. Definitely an alternative hotel especially if you want to hang around BTC area.
reviews.title: Excellent Location

reviews.text:
My husband and i booked this hotel for our colleagues using booking.com..
When our colleagues arrived there, the reception staff rejected the booking sheet saying that they have not recieved the payment..
Its strange because the detail has been written in the booking sheet, the hotel staff just need to authorized the credit card payment..
They asked our colleagues to pay in cash and my husband said no, just give them his number and he will fixed it..
Then the hotel staff never called until one of our colleagues have to connect my husband to them..
After it, the hotel staff received our colleagues to stay since its already late and will check to their system in the morning..
Next day, our colleagues called my husband again since the reception staff still insisted that they need to pay cash..
This time the hotel reception really are rude, he said that my husband need to call booking.com why the payment are not received by the hotel with the furious tone..
My husband get angry, he already called the credit card issuing bank and they said the hotel just need to authorized since there is no problem with the card..
He then asked to speak with the more competent person..
The mrs (i forgot the name) who are turned out to be the superintendent of the reception staff check the booking sheet and said its all written clear, the hotel just need to authorized the payment..
She then apologized for the bad attitude of her staff and questioned herself why they don't ask their senior if they don't know hot to deal with the booking sheet..
She said that the hotel staff are not familiar with this kind of booking and she definitely will speak to her staff about the previous behavior..
Problem solved, but we definitely will never used this hotel again since the poor service and also our colleagues said the hotel are not comfortable to stay..
reviews.title: Poor & Outdated Service

Once again,  we were do apologize and thank you for your review.

Sincerely Yours,
I Gusti Agus Suharja

reviews.text: On the way back from Bontang we stayed here for one night & it was not a very good experience.  The place needs an overhaul.  The room I was given (609) took almost full night to cool down.  Breakfast spread was so-so & the work table was heavily infested with ants which went in my laptop & kept on coming out at any time. The good point about this place is it is very close to a mall, shopping & dining area.  Parking is limited & reception area is with high ceiling.  I knew this place since 1995 but stayed here for the 1st time & it will be also last time unless I get some positive comments from visitors who stay here from now onwards.
reviews.title: Quite rundown

photos.caption: The shopping mall on opposite side

reviews.text:
This is nice  hotel good value for money, clean, good beds and lots of hot water.
restaurant not the greatest but lots of good restaurant close by. Close to shopping close to night clubs. Nice lobby lounge pool look great but I wasn't able to use as got back to hotel to late.
reviews.title: Good value

reviews.text:
The facility itself is very outdated. Ex-

Very poor accomodation for the business traveler who works from the room a lot.

      Only ether cable hook up so you must sit an uncomfortable side chair to be online.
      Very awkward, uncomfortable work area for computer

Other than changing the sheets and wiping down the bathroom floor the room really doesnt get cleaned.
     No rug vaccuuming
     No dusting or wiping down of walls. IN my room someone smashed a bloody mosquito    against a wall leaving a nasty smear. It was never touched by the cleaning crew,

THe restaurant is passable. I ate meals here quite a bit as the only other choices were fast food. SOme dishes were surprising good- even to a western palatte. They do a breakfast buffet that to me was pretty nasty, but that may be a cultural thing. I ate omelets every day. They have cereal containers- they just dont put cereal in them.

The power goes off continually. 6-8 times a day. Usually only for a few seconds.

The staff is really good here. English is strong and they really try to make you comfortable. The service will remind you of a much higher quality hotel. THe nice people who work here made this a much more pleasant experience than it might otherwise have been.
reviews.title: Down-market, but they try hard

reviews.text:
I stayed here 2 nights because my colleagues already booked this hotel.  Even I am given no-smoking room but the smoke is still smelling in the room, may be they just hide the ashtray and name it :"non-smoking room"
The horrible thing is I was touching electric-shock when open the freezer, then I realized that water is drop from up, may be the ac hose is leak and water come out.  In the morning I asked to move to other room and I go out for meeting some partners.  When back in the afternoon, the receptionist did not understand and even not saying 'sorry' or other things... I pushed them to change my room, I paid 2 nights cash before.
I never plan to stay in this hotel anymore, it was horrible.
reviews.title: Very Poor & Terrible Hotel

photos.caption: water dropped from cone of lamp

reviews.text:
Balik Papan was a fascinating provincial capital. It was clean, well maintained and orderly. 

The Hotel was centrally located and well suited for the business traveler. The lobby area is spacious with high ceiling. In November the air in Balik Papan was rather still and humid. Arriving in mid afternoon, the lobby area was too warm for comfort. Luckily checking in was a breeze.

The room was rather run-down. I was quite happy with the bedding but the bathroom was a disappointment. Hoteliers should be experienced enough to replace worn down towels. The view from the hotel room was not fascinating although sea facing.

Breakfast at the cafe was just average. As with many hotels MSG was noticeable in almost all dishes. Beverages were served at the lobby lounge. Entertainment was provided by a four piece band. The presence of overly friendly ladies trying to catch your attentions was noticeable and the Hotel did not seem to have the desire to control. Service was average. 

If you were game for Nasi Padang, there were many outlets. Starbucks and KFC were also within walking distance. We had the best fried duck rice while in Balik Papan. Ask the concierge for direction.

Internet connection was available in the lounge area. 

Balikpapan is a growing city and there are many new hotels some of which have better facilities and more lively. This hotel is an average, tired hotel in need of a makeover and a dose of adrenalin.
reviews.title: Centrally Located Average Hotel

reviews.text: A perfectly pleasant stay. Excellent location. Beautiful service and facilities. Great rooms, quite large and very clean. The only thing was the disturbance of prayer at daybreak (actually 4 am) but the hotel cannot do much about it. I actually asked to be moved to the other side (seaview) and they gave me another room. Wonderful open-air swimming pool. the real drawback was actually the food served at lunch and dinner. Breakfast was fine, but the oher meals were quite a disappointment, probably because I am not used to this kind of food (being French). Yet, evrybody else (the locals) seemed to enjoy it... Lots of restaurants, fabulous seafood, by the seaside, 10 mn from the hotel. Wonderful service.
reviews.title: Balikpapan

reviews.text:
I find this hotel in a very strategic & convinient location since the biggest mal in Balikpapan (which is Balikpapan Plaza) is literally in front of this hotel. For me, I always put location as my number 1 criteria in finding hotels since I'm a female soli traveler and I only stay in Balikpapan just for one night in order my transit to Derawan Island the day after. I don't need to explore the city, I just want to find a decent meal nearby with cheap price & shop for small groceries for my next trip to Derawan. I can say that I've found anything I need in this plaza. So that I can't feel more happier finding this very strategic hotel with its location.
The cons of this hotel is the old building, old room, old furniture & old bathroom. But it's just alright & still decent for a night stay.
One thing that really dissapointment is that they actually DON'T provide airport shuttle for every hour but only for 12 am shuttle! I asked about that shuttle since I've read the previous review under me saying that there is an airport shuttle service every hour so that I expect to have that kind of service as well. But when the receptionist asked when is my flight and I answered that it will be on 12.20 am, she said that I won't make it to the airport with the 12 am-shuttle. When I asked is there a shuttle for 11 am, she answered that there IS ONLY ONE shuttler per day, which is departing on 12 am only. How ridiculous is that?
I don't know maybe the receptionist has demeaning me for being a young woman who usually don't really like to argue or debate. 
So that in order to save my money for 50,000 rupiahs taxi fare to the airport (which actually I don't necesarrily spend for), I had to buy a KFC's cheapest package that only costs 15,000 rupiahs for my lunch (&dinner as well!). Sigh.,,,
reviews.title: Old room, Great Location, Poor quality of service since the airport shuttle only departs once a day at 12 am!

reviews.text:
Good value hotel with friendly price, good location, and not considered as a "Red Light" hotel.

Pros :
- Great location (located at city center)
- In front of a mall (Balikpapan Center, Pasifica food court)
- Great deal with as low to US$ 42 (IDR 375k) all-in price for the weekend (Breakfast and tax incl.). Other similar class hotel will cost ~US$50 - 55.
- Complimentary airport shuttle, depart every hour or so from the hotel
- Staff is helpful and friendly, service is OK, 8 out of 10.
- Room is quite big.
- Bed is averagely standard, not too good, not too bad.
- Nearby money changer, restaurant, etc.
- Mass transport is easily found (angkutan umum/taxi).
- Standard toilet amenities (soap, shampoo, etc, but no toothbrush and toothpaste)

Cons :
- Hotel is aging, interior etc is getting old.
- Swimming pool wasn't really at the hotel, but located on the other newer "Menara Bahtera" hotel, at the back of "Adika Bahtera" hotel, both hotel are owned by the same owner.
- If the windows in your room are facing street, you may hear sound from outside.
- No carpet on room, just floor tile (room type : Superior, other upper room type may have, not sure about it.)
- AC isn't working good, even you put it to max cold (but not sure if other rooms have the same problem, could be in my room only. Last stay was in 6th floor.)
- No WiFi on room, just LAN access (excl. room price)
reviews.title: Great location, great deal, but room need improvement

name: Hotel Menara Bahtera
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
address: Jln. Jendral Sudirman 2, Balikpapan 76113 Indonesia

reviews.text:
It was a solo trip for work purpose and I had a nice 1-night stay. The room was spacious and breakfast buffet was inclusive. Although not situated on one of the main roads, it is within walking distance to one big mall in Balikpapan city. There's also a local coffee shop just accros the hotel that many locals would recommend.
A few things need improvement were: couches & chairs in fabric material weren't cleaned properly, dining area for smoking people was more spacious than the non-smoking one, and they seem to allow guests to smoke in their huge lobby area.
reviews.title: Spacious room in the city center

reviews.text: I chose this hotel because a friend recommended a massage place just down the street, Wan-Wan Refleksi. I was pleased with all aspects of my stay at Menara Bahtera. They upgraded my room on arrival which was a pleasant surprise. It is in a good location, breakfast buffet was included, nice pool, welcoming staff. Very good value!
reviews.title: Passing through Balikpapan

reviews.text:
Took 3 nights stay in this hotel. I'd say this hotel need improvements on providing services to the guests. Here are some likes and dislikes of my personal opinion.

Likes:
- strategic location, just 5mins walk to nearby malls, KFC, Pizza Hut, Marts
- 15mins from Sepinggan airport
- Good hospitality from hotel staffs
- Qiblat mark available

Dislikes:
- No high speed internet
- utp cable provided but malfunction
- low quality tv cable
- can't adjust AC setting
- 2 days needed to deliver laundry service
reviews.title: Potential Hotel But Need More Effort

reviews.text:
I thought while going in it will be a fine hotel. The check in was smooth. Entered room to find an above average room and below average bathroom. Then came the hard part. There was no WiFi. 

I called reception and a guy fixed router in my room. But my other colleagues did not get WiFi like me. The speed of internet was slow.

When I was checkin out, they gave me remaining amount in cash for my credit card transaction.

Personally I would not visit this hotel again and neither will my colleagues, due to lack of internet, good rooms and service.
reviews.title: Nice hotel from outside, but inside completely different story

reviews.text:
I was here. The location is near from the city center. You can find balikpapan plaza in front of this hotel. Finding a street food or a convenience store is not a big deal. Just go outside the lobby, walk for 1-2 minutes and you can find what you need.

Pros: Very good location, large room.
Cons: It's old, and when i was here, i couldn't find a good connection wifi.
reviews.title: Very good location.

reviews.text: I chose this hotel because of its strategic location and cheap price. The rest of my impression on this hotel is its just ordinary hotel, nothing special. I regret the lack of attention to detail things such as stuffy air in the hotel area, the broken battery cover of TV remote, no hotel service guide book, etc.
reviews.title: Strategic location, but....

reviews.text: It's a very nice hotel, good service,  great facilities, but in a reachable price. Located near the big mall. A lot of cafe and fast food restaurant around the hotel. Free WiFi connection also helps so much during my stay. Helpful staff and free valets make a stay much more better.
reviews.title: Nice hotel,  good location

reviews.text: Hotel Menara Bahtera was strategically located at the heart of Balikpapan. It took 15-20 minutes drive from Sepinggan Airport to get there. Once in the hotel, local transport was easily hired. The hotel also provided Toyota Kijang available on daily rental for guests. I stayed here 2 nights in November 2016 for friends gathering. We had standard room with twin beds, space was more than adequate. Bathroom was in good condition and functioning properly. AC and TV channel was good also. Hotel management should pay attention on room cleanliness. It appeared that the room, bed and linen were not thouroughly cleaned up. Swimming pool and lobby also looked aging.
reviews.title: Great location, average stay

reviews.text:
2 minutes walk to the Plaza Mall
Rooms are big but old and not that clean.
Staff helpful with any matter. Confusing W-Lan but once it works was ok...
I will stay again in Bahtera when I go to Balikpapan
reviews.title: Good location

reviews.text: Stayed 2 night for business.. Location near shopping mall,  the lobby hotel is spacious for small meeting, Tasty breakfast, Nice and helpful staff..in front of hotel there are many taxi for rent. Recomended for business travellers.
reviews.title: Average hotel

reviews.text:
Room clean and nice. Just the water heater take so long to get hot. Find out many staff from Bali. Which i originally from balikpapan but stay in bali. They did arrangement very last minutes for idul fitri dinner for family. Thx all 
Will return next year.
reviews.title: Thx for arrangement idul fitri dinner

reviews.text: Stay at this hotel for a few days. the rooms are clean and tidy. good service. Overall stay at this hotel provides a positive impression for me although the price offered is not too cheap. so, it's a good experience.
reviews.title: Comfortable

reviews.text: Have a good promotion price. fast check in. room is nice and clean. but the breakfast is not too good and don't have separate room for smoking person. don't have many satellite channel but tv is LED and can use External HD to watch. No wifi because it repair

The hotel is located in Balikpapan city center and very close to the shopping area. hotel was clan, so does the room. room was spacious.. breakfast was good, and has quite variety in food.. this hotel is suitable for family and business trip as well.
