reviews.text: I stayed at the hotel for a day during my transit to Balikpapan. Breakfast was good, with variety of food to eat, European style, Indonesian cuisine, etc., Rooms are clean. There are two options smoking zone and a non smoking one. The swimming pool is good with a mini waterfall. There is a spa although I didn't use it to comment. Coffee house , business meet rooms are also available. Location of the hotel is added advantage. Although it is 10 kilometres from airport, it is in fact near the city centre near Balikpapan plaza, delta spa., The beach view from the hotel rooms is excellent in the mornings. The staff are friendly and polite. Overall it is a nice place to stay and worth the price.
reviews.title: Comfortable and pleasant stay

reviews.text:
Stayed 6 nights & 7 days here due to my business trip in Balikpapan was such a good thing.
My 1st impression to this hotel is its location, in which in the center of Balikpapan city, very close to mall, restaurant, & beach (Kumala). The room is comfortable, clean, cool, and also spacious!. If you have a plan to stay here, I suggest you to pick a room in the highest floor. The view is so good & breathtaking, a city view + beach + sea + hills. You're also able to see the live performance of local musicians in lobby at night, it's free. The staffs itself are nice & helpful. Breakfast menu is standard but delicious. In my opinion, this hotel is recommended & I hope they won't stop improving.
reviews.title: Spacious room & great location!

reviews.text:
I spend one several nights at Menara bahtera hotel, I was satisfied whit this hotel. Comfortable room, clean, quite for sleep. this hotel also provide a speed connection internet wifi for every room, easily acces from our room. their wifi also unlimitet (uncensor for adult content wweb, be careful for those who bring children hehehe ... ). they provided a local newspaper in every room everymorning. Bathroom has a good presure shower, and a nice smell of bath soap.
its staff also very polite and helpful make the visitor enjoy to stay here. I also loved the breakfast menu, variatif and quite delicious. they always provide 'bubur ayam' every morning.
loundry servise also satisfied and clean, and timely.
this hotel is located at center of Balikpapan city, you can take a stroll (less than 50 m) to get big mall 'Balikpapan Plaza'. next time, I will stay in this hotel again, and I recommend for you, single or family, for bussiness or for pleasure ....

reviews.text:
the hotel is well well well past itâ€™s prime.  severely neglected and ceilings rotting away and cover with white tarps to hide the mold.  pretty disgusting to say the least.

the stupidity of horrid maintenance is mind boggling but sadly this is indonesia and normally how things are done.  any health
department innany civilized country would cloes them down in an instant.

mold is a known health hazzard and unless they fix it then i recommend finding another place to stay but as a forewarning you really need to see the interior of a place and check all reviews BEFORE BOOKING !!
reviews.title: LOVE THE NASTY MOLD COVERED CEILINGS

reviews.text:
Hotel is very dirty because of no maintenance
Dirty shower with little animals
Fungi everywhere (ceiling,bad,wall)
Carpet amazingly dirty
Sigaret burning holes in blanket
Massage who dear to ask extra money above the fee and tip
Beach bar doesn't exist anymore so no beach facilities
Swimming dangerous because of bad maintenance

The pictures on there website and booking sites are old or manipulated it's totally not what you get.

Must say, after we want to go out of the hotel to another hotel, we got a upgrade which was better but not how a 4star hotel should be.
We except it but it should not be like that.

My advice don't book this hotel!!!!!!
reviews.title: Never again

reviews.text: Maybe this hotel has been very successful in the past, given its location on the beach and the area it occupies. But this hotel to be so depressing because of poor maintenance. The only interesting thing about this hotel is its easy access to the culinary center of Balikpapan City.
reviews.title: Old hotel with poor maintenance

reviews.text:
We were put in the hotel as I believe our usual one was fully booked. The guy I am traveling with stayed here three years previously. Sadly itâ€™s become quite run down. My room is fine but the bathroom looks like it needs updating/ repaired. 

On a plus side the pool looks good and it has a decent free gym. Also the staff are great.
reviews.title: Not our first choice

reviews.text: A very tired and dirty hotel, where patches of damp adorn ceilings and mildew surrounds the bath, with the added attraction of a filthy shower curtain. The only good thing is the excellent wifi. Both husband and myself have been ill from food and goodness knows what is coming from the creaking air con system. Gym is forlorn, only open half of the time and with broken air con. Swimming pool area is equally sad and the seafood restaurant permanently closed. Sadly stuck here for work for another four days, but will not be eating again in the hotel. An air of no-one cares enough to spend any money on it, though the staff are friendly and do their best. Haven't met any management -yet!
reviews.title: Do not stay here!

reviews.text: The location is next to beach. Staffs are very polite. Food was a little better than expected. The room probably needs a little upgrade as this is an old hotel. We chose this hotel because it was close to the airport (around 30mins) but it turned out to be better than expected.
reviews.title: Value for money

reviews.text: This classic hotel in Balikpapan. Good for family with middle range rate. Having a good view directly to beach. Food is average. I like the location of the hotel not to far with downtown but having range to little quiet place. Staff  and services also very good. And quality of the room i think need to be improved little bit more. Overall is good for me
reviews.title: Good for family

reviews.text:
Its an old hotel with outdated furniture and interior. Carpet flooring and sheets in the room need to be clean or refubish. 

Internet connection and TV channel are good.

Breakfast not that good. the variety of food are really limited and since there are only big table in the restaurant so you have to share a table with stranger. 

For a 4 stars hotel, this hotel need a major upgrade.
reviews.title: Old Hotel need some improvement

reviews.text:
I have stay in this hotel for my business trip problem I have is one of the bed lamp in my room are broken but the staff very responsive for fix it.... 

What I love from this hotel is it beach and strategic location for my business trip... Next time went I going to Balikpapan I will stay in this hotel
reviews.title: Classic Hotel

reviews.text: Rooms now renovated, lift also new. Some floors shows there's still leakages in few areas. Alls are very good : room, pool, private beach and services. But the breakfast menu is less and less, now like 3 star hotel if you compare with Novotel, Jatra or Swissbell-hotel breakfast. But, for sleep quality, this hotel is the best for me so far.

reviews.text:
I was very excited when first going to stay here knowing this is a four star hotel. 
But in fact it was rather disappointing. 
The hotel is old, but I guess that's no reason to ignore the facilities and services in the rooms. The old atmosphere in this hotel is so felt. The lights in the rooms are well-lit, the towels and carpets in the rooms are dirty. 
For breakfast, the choice is quite a lot but unfortunately the taste is just ordinary. i just love the chocolate croissant.
This hotel is located in front of the beach, but it just will not be my reason to come back here again.
reviews.title: Bad Experience

reviews.text: So disappointed with the service during check-in. Arrived at 4:30pm and room is still not ready. Some of the staff are not friendly at all. However, food is reasonable acceptable. Breakfast is not really taking care of since there is a large group staying in the hotel. Not a good stay this time. Really disappointed with the service.
reviews.title: Poor service, staff are not friendly

reviews.text:
Although the staff was very friendly and helpful, the hotel room itself was terrible. The carpets were stained and ripped. The bathtub was covered in black mild and peeling. The wood of the cabinets were chipped. The fabric chairs were stained and the walls were peeling. 
I must say that the staff and manager was amazing in trying to accommodate, but unfortunately nothing could be done. 
The rooms are very run down, unless you book an "executive suite". However, they were all the non-smoking rooms were full and they had only smoking rooms available (which have a very strong smell).
reviews.title: A 3-star hotel would be better than this hotel- not recommended

reviews.text: This hotel is quite old but well maintained. The room is clean and comfortable, the staffs were helpful and nice. Breakfast is fairly good. One of the best part is direct access to private beach with nice sea food restaurant. This hotel is located in the city center, walking distance to major banks and shopping center. Around the hotel are also coffee shop and restaurants offering vast array of traditional food. In short, good value of money and very good location.

reviews.text:
Stayed here out of curiosity. It has it's own private beach in the middle of the city. Well other review nailed it right. This hotel are quite old. Some 23 years. Its furniture are in need of renovation. The facilities too. Even the hotel ground doesn't seem to be well maintained. The beach are too close to local fishermen village. And also need some kind of development. In short this hotel need massive renovation.
On Services though despite seemingly lack antusiasm on guest request.Both visual and verbal, Flat face (except for the security that greet you at the entrance) and flat conversation are everywhere.  surprisingly they got their job done. They need to improve this.
Im not sure about the policy, but it does seems they put their guess in a smoking room first unless you complaint(?). Since we came not too late. However all 3 guest that check in a the same time with us came with a notification all non smoking room were full. Only minutes later upon protest that they placed us on a non smoking one. A let down.
Not much selection on breakfast but the quality are surprisingly good.
reviews.title: Past Grandeur

reviews.text: Le Grandeur use to be a classy business hotel in Balikpapan where you can get a confortable night stay. Rooms are not too clean, but toiletries have taken a few steps down. The soap is even of low quality as a cost saving exercise. smell pack with cheap perfume. The room service food is sloppy and doesnt deserve a second chance. Fish and chips are oil soaked and with cheap frozen fish squares. Because they now have different clientele, the breakfast has no western selection except eggs. dont bother about western breakfast, with 100s of people rushing to the food queue. I have not been here for a long time,  and shall not be caught here anymore. Just for the record, room 325 on 6 April. Western expat should avoid this hotel if you are looking for a good rest before a meeting.
reviews.title: Revisiting Balikpapan

reviews.text:
I stayed here for 2 nights and actually I am quite OK with it.
It is true that the hotel is old and I can see the interior somehow shows it, but from convenience point of view I am still OK.
Obviously hotel needs a lot of room of improvement especially with the fact it has quite a lot of potential (it has private beach, large pool area, etc).
The WIFI is free of charge and reliable.
The breakfast option are quite many and hot.
The dinner option is also varied with reasonable price.

For business I do not mind to stay here again, however for personal vacation, I prefer to stay in other place.
reviews.title: Old hotel but quite decent

reviews.text: Affordable prices. This hotel was good for a quick overnight stay. Good location away from busy town centre but within walking distance to good places to eat. Staff spoke basic english and were polite.
reviews.title: Affordable and good location

To summarize - a budget hotel OK for an economy stay. Not bad but for sure has all potential to do better.

reviews.text:
I stayed at the Ibis Balikpapan Hotel for 5 nights from 23 March to 28 March 2023. In short, Ibis Balikpapan is not clean, very dirty. And the hotel has never understood the concept of hygiene.  For example, small flies on the food, blackened water dispenser faucets, and cockroaches in the bathroom. (Please see the photos I uploaded.)

<1> For 5 days, every time I had breakfast, I found small flies stuck to the top of the fruit juice jar, on the pudding, and on the pieces of fruit. I had reported to the restaurant staff 2 times, but the next morning there were still flies. They never improved the situations and never apologized to me. Never said any kind of "sorry".(Please see the photos I uploaded.). 

<2> Ibis Balikpapan does not provide mineral water in plastic bottles, but they do provide water dispensers in the corridors. The problem is, the dispensers that line up are not kept clean so that the water dispenser faucets have turned black. I'd checked all the dispensers that were on the floor I was staying at. I also asked housekeeping staff to clean it up, but until the day I checked out it had not been cleaned.(Please see the photos I uploaded.)

<3> Everyday, without exception, I found small cockroaches, measuring 3-4mm, in the bathroom. (Please see the photos I uploaded.)
reviews.title: Flies stuck to the food/ Cockroaches/ Dirty water dispensers

owner_response.text:
Dear Musikkurakura, 

Thank you for taking the time to write this review. I am sorry to hear about your experience regarding the cleanliness in the room. Please be informed immediate action have been done to rectify this issue. We Worked together with pest control, our F&B team and our house keeping team have done deep cleaning process in the room to avoid this situation occurred again in the future. We appreciate your sharing your concerns and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the near future.


Sincerely,
Dewi Ningsih 
Duty Manager

Overall, I highly recommend it.

reviews.text:
Pros
Stayed here for 3 nights. At first I was a bit disappointed because the room was small and the bathroom was smaller. But after the first night, it grew on me. Super clean. Hot water works shower super good and spacious enough for me. Everything works. I went there by motorbike. Parking super easy and quite safe. Ibis doesnâ€™t have swimming pool but we can use Novotelâ€™s swimming pool. Which is awesome.  Aircon is good. Sheets and towels are clean. 
Location location location! I love it! Prime location i tell you.

Cons
It was my birthday during the stay, and looking at other people review being celebrated by a surprise cake i kinda hoped i get the same treatment. But no one came to me. So sad. It was my solo trip.
I also noticed there were no hospitality spirit among the staff at the Front Office. Itâ€™s like they have lost the spark. Idk what happened but i think you should fix that soon. They seemed not happy. Except for my favorite chubby male staff of housekeeping. He still got that hospitality vibe  when facing a guest. I can feel good vibes from him. 

Overall it was a pleasant stay. Iâ€™ll be back for sure!

Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
reviews.title: My Ibis Balikpapan Experience

reviews.text:
We stayed several nights at this hotel, spread over a period of about 10 days. For the price we found it good value - especially as we were able to use the swimming pool at the Novatel next door!
A buffet breakfast was included, with a good range of hot local and western food, and including cereals, pastries and toast.
We stayed in a different room each time - one had dodgy airconditioning, but generally they were acceptable and the beds were comfortable. Housekeeping were great - bought us extra towels and anything else we requested.
The location was good - a short walk to the main road and seafront, and to a big shopping centre and mosque.
reviews.title: Good value option

Executive Secretary & Marcomm
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
It was my first but memorable stay in Ibis Balikpapan.
My check in and check out process were very fast helped by Ryan and Exel. Then when I entered my smoking room didn't smell at all.  The VIP amenities was very beautiful. The room was like any other Ibis.
One thing that really impressed me was the staffs response to my requests. They were very polite, helpful and quick. Like when I borrowed sarong and praying mat just came less than 10 minutes delivered by Jumadi. The room service was also good. I like the taste and presentation of oxtail soup. The waiter who delivered my order was also polite. The first night waiter was Rai and for the second night was Hendra who delivered my room service.
When I had breakfast the waitress, Cyintia and Tjandra her supervisor also helpful since finding me seat and asked what I want to have. They also helped me chose Ayam Singkawang for my lunch. It was so delicious. They said that was Kalimantan's original taste I had to try.
That girl who was in charge as duty manager that evening, Novita was also very polite. She came to me said hi and offered if I wanted to try food stall outside near drop off area. It was like a traditional stall also cheap but delicious. 
Then finally when I asked for transportation to airport and assistance with my plane ticket Dewi and Zulfa helped me. They came with official issue boarding pass. Maybe because the airline office was in the same building.
Feels like five star service from three star hotel.
One thing that they need to improve was the internet connection's speed. It was not fast enough like I need. The rest was very good.
reviews.title: Three star hotel with five star services

owner_response.text:

Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope your next visit will be as pleasant as the previous one.


Warm regards,

Zulfa Roslani
Executive Secretary & Marcomm

reviews.text:
This must be the most unorganised, dirty and incompetent Ibis hotel I have stayed at.
When my usual hotel was booked out, I went to Ibis as I have have had very good experiences with the chain in other areas.
I thought I was walking into a Toko or local shop with boxes sitting around everywhere. No door staff, just the three standing at the front desk. 
No real distinction between the front desk and the bar/restaurant as they seem to merge into one. At least one person on the front desk knew what was happening. Standing for over 35 minutes checking in almost got me overcome by cigarette smoke. While the smokers were outside, the doors were left open so they could talk to their colleagues inside. Smoked out.
The rooms are ok. Small and the bathrooms are poky but it is an Ibis so Iâ€™m not expecting a Hilton. 
Very tempted to cut my stay short and move next door to the Novotel.
Will not be a return visitor...better options by far just next door.
reviews.title: No Ibis

reviews.text:
Firstly, it took me about 30 minutes just to check in into the hotel. There were two receptionist at the counter. While the first receptionist was attending to another guest, the other one didnt seem to care about my existence, probably assuming i was together with the other guest. 

Room was small but it was enough for me. Toilet was smelly and unclean.

I requested for iron after i checked in and was told that they ran out of iron and will try to get from another guest and deliver it to my room. Didnt receive any update from them so I went again to the receptionist and was told that there is no iron available for me. So had to go for my first day of the business conference with wrinkle shirt (luckily i wear jacket).

During the business conference, I had a chat with a fellow attendee staying at novotel. He updated that novotel had the same iron shortage but the hotel offered him free iron service for his shirt and trouser. Same service should be offered at ibis.
reviews.title: A lot to improve especially the service

name: Midtown Xpress Balikpapan
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text:
Staying here during the weekend I booked 2 rooms (602 and 603) a larger rooms than in the lowers floors. This room have the a great view to the sea and also the biggest mall in Balikpapan. 1 room have balcony while the other while taking bath we can see the view from the bathroom (my children love this room). 

The breakfast so many variety (koko krunch, milk, salad, appetizer to dessert and the also have infused water and of course they have live cooking for the ommelete). 

The cafe open 24 hours and have Tanamera coffee brand which very famous in Jakarta. I also asked for airport shuttle and the driver already standby in the airport and help our luggages. 

Very recommended hotel if you have a plan to visit Balikpapan.
reviews.title: EXCELLENT HOTEL

reviews.text:
During my Balikpapan business trip, i prefer to chose hotel property in a prime location.
Midtown express balikpapan is located in a central town. walking distance with mall, atm, food hall and business purpose.
when i noticing this hotel actually 2 star but they had a very decent room facility and breakfast just like a 3 star +

complete amenities and they changed it daily, they even give me an additional mineral water.

room was compact and modern. suits on me! cleanliness was perfect.
i'm happy with the variety of breakfast. complete nutrition; protein, carbo, fish, and few of jajan pasar.

The staff service trully excellent.
glad to say that the hotel management give them a proper well trainning
- although the hotel was fullbooked, hotel staff still give the guest name recognition.
- fast respond in every aspect. i request to laundry by morning and its ready by the afternoon. i just asking to the housekeeping "is it my laundry already finished?" they say hold on, let us check. and the next 2 minutes my laundry is being delivered to my room. wow! same thing when i request a tiny little help and they just doing excellent.

So happy to say that i do have a wonderful time in Midtown Express Balikpapan. keep up your good work
reviews.title: Business Friendly Hotel

U may seen the world cup match with the economist beverage  package offering. And for selfie lovers, this hotel has many spot to be taken, such as at the restaurant and it really instagramable. Beside, the hotel really near to the mall, so my kiddos can spend their days out there..
So, overall .. it feels like home. While i stay faraway from family during ied day.. Seems like all staff so friendly and nice also helpful. The fo staff help me with the xpress check in, and it has wide parking car area. The food was good, and the houskeeping staff really helpfull while im asking them to make up my room.
Will be come back again, there..

reviews.text:
Ukuran kamarnya kecil kurang cocok buat orang yang bawa banyak tas atau koper gede. Air shower kamar mandi gak stabil, kadang airnya deras kadang kecil banget sampe mau bilas jadi lama banget. Staf ramah, tapi beberapa kali house keeping gak bersihin kamar kecuali saya telpon, dan kamar baru dibersihkan seringnya udah sore banget sekitar jam 4 bahkan lebih. Pas saya telpon ke bagian house keeping, stafnya malah nanya "Ibu tidak request dibersihkan?", lah memangnya setiap hari saya harus request dulu?? Saya menginap 4 malam disini, di hari pertama dan kedua dibersihkan, tapi berikutnya harus saya yg aktif minta. Selain itu pengalaman menginap di hotel lain, yg namanya kamar dibersihkan itu udah mandatory, kecuali tamunya yg gak mau. Kadang setelah pulang kerja sampai kamar, kamar masih belum dibersihkan. Kelebihannya dekat dengan E walk mall dan pentacity.
Ohya sarapan juga biasa aja. Karena kurang suka dgn hospitality-nya saya akhirnya pindah hotel.

reviews.text: To be fair, I put this up front: I didn't get to stay here, well, I choose not to (for now), to be exact. With that in mind, let's continue. I believe, this hotel has a nice room, great arrangement. Love how the children space accommodate adults, with outdoor setting near the lobby, so smoker parents can still smoke, read newspaper, sipping coffee, and can be close to their children. The pool is great, outdoor and on high floor. So you can enjoy the city view from above. The bar is just next to it. The spa is on the same floor. Like I said earlier, I didn't spend the night here, so I don't know how the room setting, the bathroom, the amenities, but I'm sure it's great. Hell, maybe even the breakfast taste delicious. OK, here's why. As I walked up to the receptionist, no smile, no welcome, no good afternoon, no what can I do for you. No, none of that happened. Maybe she was busy, maybe she was having a hard time, but hell, this is hospitality industry, and you're working in one. At least a fake smile will do, which by the way, i didn't get either. With a front line like that, I didn't want to know how the others like. Especially when I want to bring my parents, friends, and family for a long weekend stay there. Maybe, I'll try it for myself first, and not now, not in the near future. Who knows, maybe then I'll change my rating too.
reviews.title: New Style of Hospitality?

hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
address: Jalan Balikpapan-Handil, Rt.01 Km.44 Margomulyo Samboja, Balikpapan 75273 Indonesia

reviews.text:
This is expensive but the quality is high and the money goes to an  inspiring cause. I recommend watching Willie Smitt Ted Talk. He is the founder and it gives an overview of the vast project of Samboja Lestari. 
Although it is known for Orangutan and Sunbear rehabilitation, it's the work on replanting decimated forests that is most inspiring. An example of vision, imagination and hope against all odds.

The lodge is designed to high quality using architecture and materials of local Dayak . You eat dinner to the sounds of the rainforest plus orangutans bellowing in the background. You learn all about the Orangutans and sun bears, mainly rescued from people keeping them as pets or in the entertainment industry. The efforts to rehabilitate them (sometimes not possible). Our guide had an inspiring story of quitting is well paid job in the mining industry when he realised the damage it was doing and taking a much  less well paid job so that he could work towards a better future for his daughter. There was some information about the reforestation but the Willie Smitt Ted talk gives a much better overview of just what a challenge they took on, with planet and people front of mind and the incredible impact they've already had in just 20 years.   
The food is excellent some of the best we've had in Indonesia. They catered well for vegetarians which we were very grateful for. We looked forward to each meal.   
Service was excellent. Staff spoke good English and we're friendly and attentive which made things easy. 
Bear in mind there are costs for meals and there are no other places to eat. 250,000 rupiah per meal per person. Breakfast is included in the room rate.  

They offer pick up and drop off from where you need. It's 500,000 rupiah each way. Top tip -  if you organise pick up - make sure you specify exactly where to meet the driver or ask them to give you a description of the car that will pick you up so you can find them. We arranged to be picked up at the bus station but the driver did not look for us in the waiting area he simply say outside waiting in his car.

They are (rightly) very strict on COVID measures as it poses a risk to the Orangutans so you need to get an antigen test before you arrive. They took us to get it  as part of the pick up service.    

Great for kids - they can help create the enrichment activities for the Sunbears and you can see the Sunbears up close. Our 8 year old loved it!
reviews.title: A place of hope, beauty and inspiration

reviews.text:
We stayed one day / two nights at the lodge. We watched feeding of the orangutans, and they are really beautiful animals, and it was a fantastic experience to see them. 
The sun bears were less interesting. It was a very zoo/cage-like experience to meet them
The guide was nice, but insisted we wear face-masks at all times, which is super-hysterical for outdoor activities.
We also went on the river trip in the afternoon. It is a very long drive and part of the road to/fro the lodge is extremely bad. The boat engine was the most noisy boat engine I ever hear, and I heard a fewâ€¦
We did see proboscis monkeys, but they also have a group where you board the boat, so the EXTREMELY noisy boat trip seemed a bit superfluous. Most of the way is quite boring, but we did see more proboscis, a kingfisher and a sleeping snake. I cannot recommend this trip due to the engine noise. 
The lodge is beautiful and so are the rooms - with air con. Food is basic and to the very greasy side, but itâ€™s tasty and well prepared. 
I can certainly recommend Samboja lodge!
reviews.title: Beautiful Orangutans

reviews.text: This exceptional lodge located in a rainforest near Balikpapan, Borneo, offers first class accommodation and food on the grounds of the BOSF - an NGO to provide care and rehabilitation for displaced or orphaned orangutans. Our guide, Imam, showed us a number of orangutans and sun bears, took us on a motorized canoe to observe long nose monkeys and walked with us to a canopy bridge in a nearby rainforest. He professionally answered any questions about nature and culture. Cooking and service was outstanding - everyone always smiled - and we enjoyed cold drinks under the roofed patio of the lodge. We recommend the roof top lodge overlooking the rainforest. 3 unforgettable days!
reviews.title: Luxurious Jungle Retreat with guaranteed Orangutan sightings

reviews.text:
We spent a couple of nights at the lodge in the upper king suites. The view there is stunning. The general staff is friendly and ready to explain anything about the conservation station. The food is good. 

But you could do more of the place. The welcoming warmth experienced somewhere else is missing.
reviews.title: Something is missing

reviews.text: We stayed only one night in the tower room, what a delight!!! Wish we had booked 2-3 nights. Beautiful lodge, clean, great food, amazing canopy and sunset views and friendly staff. The work the BOS foundation does here is incredible and the tour guides are so well informed and can answer all your questions regarding anything Orangutans. I loved the fact that the orange primates were roaming on these islands just across a small river, easy to get good photographs, and the guides gave us plenty of time to just observe them in the wild.The orangutans there are in transition, it takes 13 years to actually release "circus", "zoo" and "pet" orangutans back into the wild, it is a privilege to witness what this foundation is providing to the endangered specie. The lodge and its surrounding is also an amazing haven to relax, read and just breathe in the beauty this jungle has to offer. I highly recommend and actually hope to have the opportunity to return one day!
reviews.title: Orangutan lover paradise

reviews.text:
I have spent 3 nights in Sambodja Lodge because I had read that we could have activities with orangutans (food preparation, making behavioral enrichment activities, recording observational data). All these informations are also written on the book that is given to you at arrival at the Lodge
In fact, it is a SCAM because you are NOT allowed by the staff to do these activities, even if you show them all documents (vaccinations, findings of viral serologies and quantiferon).
Thus, I strongly do NOT recommend to stay in Sambodja Lodge. To spend a half day visit in that place is highly enough.
reviews.title: Isabelle (France)

reviews.text:
This is a unique lodge i have seen. To reach this lodge, from SAMS (sepinggan, balikpapan) international airport, it takes approximately 1 hour with a distance of 35km. The lodge is Very natural, far from noisy or busy sound of the city like you maybe face it. The lodge surrounded by plants, typical endemic trees of Borneo. There is internet, but no television. You can do activities by visiting the Orangutan Concervation centre which managed by BOSF Borneo Orangutan Survival Foundation and also Sun Bears (or Beruang Madu), both are typical Borneo protected animals. 
The road is little bid muddy If it rains. It is better If you bring or rent a 4 wheel drive vehicle (hoping local government can help improve the road infrastructure of this area someday).
reviews.title: Unique lodge

reviews.text: Just wonderful! So tranquil, listening to the sounds of nature at the lodge was just sublime. We wish we couldâ€™ve stayed longer, but did not have the time. I was there with my American husband who hadd never been to Indonesia and my Australian brother in October 2018 (I am half Indo/half Aussie, living in the US for 16+ years). My husband and I stayed in one of the king suites with private balcony at the top of the tower which we absolutely loved. My brother stayed in a standard room which he really enjoyed, it was comfortable and has a long balcony shared with other rooms. The lodge was so peaceful and quiet, even though there were at least 20 other people there during our stay. The food was tasty, simple Indonesian fare served family buffet style. We saw the orangutans and sunbears (as I had done before with my mother back in 2011, but only during the day and we didnâ€™t stay at the lodge). On this trip our guide got us to go inside one of the bear enclosures to hide and distribute the food in trees and in the long grass right before the bear feeding. A sneaky and daring wild macaque monkey also made an appearance and climbed into the enclosure looking for food. My brother also went on their river tour, where he saw wild proboscis monkeys swim across the river (some were carrying their babies), he said it was an amazing sight to see! He did mention that it was a shame to see garbage in and along the water the closer they got to villages/small towns. Coming back to BOS after 7 years I noticed that their forest was smaller when we went up to the lookout tower at the office. Our guide told us they lost quite a chunk of forest during a fire a few years ago, caused by local farmers. It is such a fragile eco system and was very saddening to see, BOS is trying hard to educate the local people and government on how important it is to conserve the forest and wildlife. I just feel it is still a losing battle and one that truly breaks my heart as my mother grew up in Samboja and it is just a hopeless feeling to see it change so much every time we go back and visit the area. But at least they are trying and integrating the local community with it, including some of my distant relatives who have worked or still work for BOSF. I was pleasantly surprised to find out that Garuda Airlines is a donator of BOS Foundation; they even have a BOSF documentary showing in flight that we watched that was interesting and educational. I would recommend this lodge to anyone and to support their desperate fight for conservation. They also offer volunteer programs which I would love to do one of these days.
reviews.title: Lovely eco nature lodge in the middle of the jungle, would highly recommend!

photos.caption: one of the orangutan enclosures I could see from our balcony
naughty macaque that snuck into the sunbear enclosure during feeding time
Rescued orangutan on one of the islands just a short few minute walk from the lodge
Rescued orangutan on one of the islands just a short few minute walk from the lodge
walking around one of the islands where the rescued orangutans are kept
Rescued orangutan on one of the islands just a short few minute walk from the lodge

sunbears on the BOSF Samboja lodge property
feeding time of the sunbears on the BOSF Samboja lodge property
one of the orangutan enclosures I could see from our balcony

reviews.text:
We stayed here for two nights between dive trips and it was a welcome break from what can be hard core travelling in Kalimantan.

We were travelling with another couple and were the only guests.  We visited the orangutans twice and the sun bears once, all with an excellent guide.  Samboja is an excellent way to see these animals whilst contributing to their rehabilitation.  I would also recommend the late afternoon river trip to see the proboscis monkeys.  

The lodge itself is comfortable - big rooms with hot water.  The food was good and plentiful.
reviews.title: A comfortable and relaxing place to experience the wildlife of Kalimantan

reviews.text: We had originally hoped to do one of the river trips to see orangutans in the wild.  Unfortunately, we couldnâ€™t coordinate that with visiting the Derawan Islands too.  I found a small write up of Samboja in one of the travel guides, so I explored the website, and we decided to give it a shot for 3 days.  For nature lovers, this is absolutely amazing.  The lodge is in the middle of a large forest where the Samboja organization is rehabilitating orangutans and sun bears that have been taken for pets around Indonesia.  The ultimate goal is to train the orangutans to be released in the wild. Unfortunately the sun bears cant be released right now. The lodge is a couple miles down a dirt road, and is a gorgeous wooden stucture, reminding me of lodges in the US National Parks. The rooms are simple, but provided all that is needed. All the rooms have forest views, and there is a viewing area in the upper tree canopy you can climb to.  We sat there for several hours enjoying the solitude and peace and sounds of the forest.  While sitting, all of a sudden a troop of macaques were playing in the trees and it was such a delight to watch.  Food was a good quality buffet, and they were willing to make special meals if requested.  The staff gives tours of the orangutan islands and the sun bears twice daily.  It was so wonderful to see the orangutans in the wild like this. We went on an optional tour to the â€œblack riverâ€ one evening to see proboscis monkeys.  Was great, and the boat took us right past a local village out to the ocean.  Samboja is a place to go to relax and enjoy nature and peacefulness.  A previous reviewer complained there was nothing to do thereâ€”that is the point!  Definitely worth a stop.  And you will be supporting a great conservation organization.
reviews.title: True experience in the jungle; not to miss

reviews.text:
Really great experience. I did a day trip from Balikpapan to the Samboja lodge to attend the afternoon tour which also includes a nice lunch at the lodge too. On the tour I got to learn and see sun bears, including a cub climbing trees. 

The sun bears are had lots of spaces and go through various stages of rehabilitation and learning skills like finding food yo be able to be released into the wild. Likewise with the orangutans. It was great to see them living in a caring and learning environment. Staff were also very knowledgeable and friendly too.
reviews.title: Day trip to see Orangutans and Sun bears

reviews.text: Our guide was very informative and helpful. Unfortunately we had missed out on staying there as we hadn't realised that the price of the room included the tours. If we were to go again we would defiantly stay with them for a night as it would make the tours much cheaper. There are great views from the top floor of the lodge where I believe one of the rooms is situated.
reviews.title: Amazing day visit with lunch included and an expert guide.

reviews.text:
What a great job these guys do, rescuing Orangutans and sun bears. The lodge is beautiful, serene, very comfortable and so well built. The views are spectacular and it was such a relaxing stay. Donâ€™t expect to see a huge amount of Orangutans as most of the 140 Orangutans they have are at a different location which is not accessible to visitors as they are being rehabilitated or at the clinic getting medical treatment, but you do get to see a huge male Orangutan that lives on one of their islands, various females and a baby that was born there earlier this year. The Orangutans that live on the islands there were rescued from circuses or were pets and so cannot be reintroduced into the wild, but they are living here as close to being in the wild as possible. 
The lodge also offer some day trips which were great to do. Carry on the good work!
reviews.title: Very deserving of support

reviews.text:
We came here as my wife and eldest daughter wantes to see the Orangatans and eldest is also interestes in conservation.....i just needes to get away.

Picked up at airport and its a 60 min drive. Once you arrived you feel relaxed. 

1st afternoon we visited the Sun Bears and watched them being fed. Our guides English was perfect and he was very patient  with the childrens questions.

Food was basic but tasty and the beds very comfortable. We had booked the tower king but their was a water leak so we were given 2 queen rooms insead. Very comfortable rooms and beds with Mosquito nets.

Slept like  a baby first night (and 2nd as well). 

2nd day saw the amazing Orangatans on their islands and again our guide was very knowledgable.

Whilst it is a tad pricy, the money goes to a good cause and its well worth a 2 night stay to just get away from it all.

No TV, so bring books to read at night, or play pool vs the staff, and if you want mobile coverage, Telkomcel has the best coverage here.
reviews.title: Wonderful work, basic lodge and facilities

reviews.text: this place in the middle of the new forest and so natural. lovely staff and must visit again this place. When stay at here in the morning we can walking track, we will see wild life around the forest. and little bit walking to island of orangutan. if we lucky we can help feed them too.
reviews.title: the great lodge i'd ever seen

reviews.text:
I booked this hotel so I could get close up to the animals, visit the nature and relax in the rainforest. I booked this over the boat tours along the river as I thought the comforts of the hotel would be nicer overnight.  Other guests had bed bugs and once you checked in then the staff really did not care much further

The pre-arrival information was good offering various day trips and options. However when I arrived I discovered I could not leave my room or reception area without an escorted staff member. 
I was not free to visit all areas of the park along and only had access to 2 orangutan islands from afar. Everything else was off limits. I was told I needed 10 days for quarantine and they donâ€™t let guests up close to the animals.
The day trips  basic and little animal wildlife to bee seen. 
Alcoholic drinks were overpriced a they had you in a captive market, however the funds go to a good cause.

I was captive in the reception area and no outdoor space or hammocks to relax in the sunshine. 
Maximum one day stay is all you need here as there is very little to see or do
reviews.title: Very little do do there

reviews.text:
Stayed at this amazing place for 1 week just wish I could have stayed longer.
The food and accommodation was excellent with nothing too much trouble.
An amazing experience working with the fellow. volunteers and the team that care full time for the Sun bears and orangutans.
The knowledge, love and wealth of experience that Kate, Wik and Sam along with their team show you how much this project is needed.
From painting the vet clinic to making enrichment for the orangutans and Sun bears there wasn't a day we didn't smile apart from learning more about the plight of these wonderous. creatures.
If you are looking to make a difference and save these beautiful animals from extinction then sign up for this project you won't regret it I promise.
reviews.title: Samboja Lodge holiday as a volunteer

reviews.text: Myself and 2 girlfriends stayed at the Samboja Lodge Balikpapan part of The Great Projects experience. The Place is amazing tertiary rainforest and the humidity is about 90 per cent. It is excellent if you want to feel part of the forest but it is not the sort of place to relax by a pool. It is exotic but not luxury.There are lots of mozzies! Tourists were coming in and out on short visits or staying  to see the Orang Utans and Sunbears. The way they are cared for and in many cases returned to the wild is fantastic. It is educational and fascinating. We were there 2 weeks as we were working. It is an unforgettable place.  Some of the rooms only have cold water which is sometimes difficult. It is wonderful if you want to feel part of the jungle but don't want to actually sleep in a tent !! The food was very good but not fancy--which is fine and just really suitable to the environment...served in a restaurant  terrace open to the jungle. The bar serves beers.  We took a trip to the Black River with a local fisherman and that was a fantastic sunset cruise. The place is altogether wonderful and deserves support and visits for it's amazing work to help the environment and the extraordinary animals. The scenery and sense of peace are part of the overall beauty of the place.
reviews.title: Eco holiday as a volunteer

photos.caption: Recently freed on to an Island.
Sunbear in his enclosure searching for food.

reviews.text:
On our way from the nearby Sun Bear feeding time and Bangkirai Treetops walk, we decided to detour to Samboja Lodge before continuing to the beach for a relaxing sunset snack. The access road is terrible, and must be much worse after heavy rain, but we were lucky and reached the Lodge after only 10 minutes. 

On walking into the Lodge foyer, we were struck by the beauty of the architecture and the lush forest setting - breath-taking! We had a peek into the comfortably and well appointed rooms, each designed with a balcony and roomy private bathroom. The suite room in the corner had windows on 2 sides, like being in the middle of the forest. Perfect to spend a few days writing, contemplating, relaxing and being a part of this effort to rescue and rehabilitate orangutans displaced by habitat loss. 

A short walk down hill to the islands (they are building number 7!) was a treat. We strolled around one of the islands, encountering a magnificent flanged male. As the orangutans do not swim, these make perfect refuges, ideal for eco tourism.
reviews.title: A visit to Samboja Lodge and the Orangutan Rehabilitation Islands

reviews.text: A great place with a mission to save the endangered orangutans and sun bears. Staff and volunteers work with former pets and animals from circuses with a goal to release them back into the nature. A limited number of animals, not fit for realease due to illness, are kept on artificial islands for visitors to see. Trip from Balikpapan takes about 1,5 hours - bring good hiking boots!
reviews.title: Fantastic place with an important mission

reviews.text: Lokasi dekat Rumah Sakit Umum. Kamar tenang dan bersih, kamar luas dan nyaman, ada air panas mandi, ac dingin, ada pembuat teh kopi. Wifi bagus. Staf ramah dan proses check in/out cepat dan lancar. Ojek online banyak tersedia.

reviews.text: Hotelnya bersih dan nyaman. Untuk pendingin lumayan. Air panas kurang bagus. Wifi juga sangat kurang. Pelayanan sangat ramah. Breakfast biasa aja and not recomended. Luas kamar lumayan namun maintenance kurang diperhatikan.

reviews.text: Terletak dekat dengan pusat kota, hotelnya nyaman,  dengan fasilitas yang cukup memadai. Tersedia air panas/dingin dengan ukuran kamar mandi yang cukup luas. Staffnya ramah, dan sangat membantu. Untuk restoran tersedia sarapan pagi yang bervariasi.

reviews.text:
Saya menginap disini karena dekat dengan kerjaan di RS Hermina, namun saya kecewa ðŸ˜¥ dengan pelayanan hotel saya komplain soal air panas sejak awal cek in sampai dengan H-1 mau cek out, masalah saya tidak pernah selesai. Air panas tidak menyala sama sekali, dijanjikan akan ada teknisi ke ruangan sejak kali pertama komplain sampai dengan saya tulis review ini tidak ada satupun teknisi yang cek ke kamar saya. Apa memang begini pelayanan hotel ini? Yg notabene bintang 3 menurut mereka? 4 hari 3 malam saya disini sudah 3 hari 2 malam saya komplain tidak ada tanggapan, cari MOD atau Duty Manager alasannya sibuk atau tidak ada. Maksudnya apa? Apa ini lelucon ðŸ˜„? Tp jujur ini tidak lucu ðŸ˜„ sama sekali!

Jeffrey Andrianto

Sayang lorong kamar lantainya tidak dilapisi karpet. Masuk kamar anda menemukan kamar luas tapi ada yang aneh dengan keramik lantai di kamar 519. reviews.text:
Pesan lewat pegi-pegi karena murah dan ad promo kartu kredit yg menarik,booking 4D3N tipe deluxe utk urusan keluarga..

Kelebihan hotel ini :
-Ada fasilitas gym (terbatas alatnya)
-whirpool (lg maintenance saat menginap)
-spa
-sky lounge
-dekat dg RSUD KANUSODJO,transmart,giant,toko kue legendaris Nam Min,

Kekurangan hotel ini :

Saran:
Lantai kamar tipe executive dan suite di kasi karpet agar lantai tdk dingin, penerangan kamar ditambah lampu neon putih,televisi bs usb play movie

reviews.title: nice hotel in downtown

reviews.text: Hotel Mitra Amanah berlokasi sangat strategis dekat dengan Taman Bekapai, pusat perbelanjaan seperti Balikpapan Plaza maupun Pasar Klandasan. Dengan harga yang cukup murah, kita sudah mendapatkan kamar yang bersih dan memuaskan.

reviews.text: Hotel ini termasuk yang paling murah di Balikpapan, lokasi sangat strategis, berada di pusat kota, dekat masjid Istiqomah Pertamina, dekat pusat perbelanjaan Balikpapan Plaza, suasana Islami, ada musholla
reviews.title: Murah, Strategis, Islami

reviews.text: Kamarnya bersih, ac dingin, kamar mandi bersih, ada tv, wifi kencang (dibasemant), berhubung sedang puasa pas buka dikasih snack, pas sahur dikasih makan tp cmn standar, lumayan laah, untuk kamar standar permalam 160rb

reviews.text: Hotel ini letaknya di tengah kota Balikpapan tepatnya di belakang Taman Bekapai. Di seberang Taman Bekapai mudah dijumpai rumah makan dan restoran. Harga hotel ini juga ekonomis dan pelayanan serta fasilitas standar.

reviews.text: Hotel murah berkonsep syariah, letaknya di pusat kota tepatnya di belakang taman bekapai, pelayanannya lumayan, kamarnya standar, akses wifi gratis, dan tv kabel. Sangat direkomendasikan bagi yang mencari hotel terjangkau di pusat kota.
reviews.title: Terjangkau

reviews.text: Hotel berkonsep islami, dikamar sampai wifi, kamarmandi tidak terlalu besar tetapi bersih. Dikamar terdapat peralatan shalat, breakfast nasi goreng, roti bakar, teh jeruk, telur goreng, kurang lebih 100an meter dari jalan sudirman
reviews.title: hotel murah yang bagus

reviews.text: Tinggal hampir 2,5 minggu di hotel ini saat lagi ada kerjaan di Balikpapan. Posisinya cukup strategis, walupun tidak persis di dekat jalan utama. Kamarnya tidak terlalu luas, ada wifi gratis (hanya di area tertentu), dan sarapannya sebagian besar roti bakar.
reviews.title: hotel kelas menengah

reviews.text: hotelnya lumayan,bersih,wifi ada,tv ada,ac dinign,kamar mandi bersih,sayang ga ada liftnya (itung-itung buat olah raga naik turun tangga),servis standar hotel,murah tapi bukan murahan,cocok untuk yang ekonomi kelas bawah dan menengah

reviews.text:
wonderfull stay and very welcoming staff and ambience , love the room view and this hotel are so luxurious , we really enjoyed our stay .
the foods are first class and the service was amazing , credit to FB team and all staff member for giving me such an experience
reviews.title: STAYCATION

reviews.text: Very spacious old hotel. Friendly staff. Have gym and pool (didnt use it though).. unfortunately the internet is very slow and inconsistent. Plenty of space for parking. This is my second time here. But unless they fix the internet , I dont think I will stay here for the third time.
reviews.title: Great value. Lousy internet

owner_response.text:
Dear andrewyuniar.Mr ,

Warmest Greeting from Horison Sagita Balikpapan..

For your unsatisfaction during your stay at our hotel,I am on be half of management Horison Sagita Balikpapan,apologizing for your inconvenience about the poor of our Internet connection .Thankyou for your input and comment,I will to coordinate with our IT to fix it immadiately,so that this  does not happen in the future for other guests .
If you still want to stay with us,we are ready to help you and please donâ€™t hesitate to contact us.
We are looking forward for your next come at our hotel..

Regards,



Dodik.Saputro
(General Manager)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
From deluxe rooms, i upgrade to executive rooms (2 room for me and family - Sagita only have non-smoking room at executive class room only). 

The receptionist was no very welcome for Traveloka user, i called at the night before and he said that we're allowed to early check-in if they room are available, but in that afternoon the lady said we need to wait until 2 pm because there will be a group that will come?? (finally we're allowed to check-in early). 

When entering room, the sink was clodged, so we're moved to other room. The interior was old, you can feel dust inside the room. I have bed light that don't have switch (my other room have the switch). 

And he worst part is that the water feel slimy/soap, when my wife ask then, they said it because they just clean out the water pond, and its already better condition from couple of days before (what  a terriblece work). 

One tips for me, if you went here just because of the pool, be aware that the pool might be unavailable if someone book their ballroom for wedding since the ballroom are aside the pool (like me, they inform me that the pool will be close due to wedding event on Sunday).
reviews.title: Old hotel with maintenance issue

owner_response.text:
Dear Ipin4u,Mr..

Warmest Greeting from Horison Sagita Balikpapan..

For your unsatisfaction during your stay at our hotel,on be half of management Horison Sagita Balikpapan,I apologize for your inconvenience about our frontdesk service when you check-in and for the room facilities and slimy water.Thankyou for your input and comment,we will make better changes for our service and maintenance,so that this  does not happen in the future for other guests .
If you still want to stay with us,we are ready to help you and please donâ€™t hesitate to contact us.
We are looking forward for your next come at our hotel..

Best Regards,
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
I booked 2 rooms via Traveloka for total of RP 578,000 but for walk-in rate, it will be RP 700,000.

The bedsheet has holes and stain. The room is basically clean.
The interior of the hotel is nice but it is an old hotel.
The service is friendly, the check in was fast, the wifi is fast too.

The cheapest hotel with 8.3 ratings in Traveloka, that is why I chose this hotel.
reviews.title: Cheaper to book in Traveloka

owner_response.text:
Dear Lilianasoebi,Mrs

Warmest Greeting from Horison Sagita Balikpapan..

Thankyou for choosing our hotel as your residential during your visit.We are so happy for your satisfaction and comfort during your stay with us.We hope we can always continue to maintain and improve our service and facilities. 
We also hope You can be make our hotel as â€œyour homeâ€ when you have a holiday or visit to Balikpapan.
We are looking forward for your next come at our hotel..

Best Regards..
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: from my several previous trips to balikpapan, this is the best value for money budget hotel that i've tried. the wifi was good, check in process was quite fast, and the breakfast was fairly good. will stay again
reviews.title: good place to stay in budget

reviews.text: Arrive at 21.00 plan to take a beautifull rest but that just in a dream if i can sleep the entire night. An old Hotel with lack maintaince. Change room 2 times with a bathroom problem and the 3rd room has the same problem. They need to renovate the hotel. Wont stay
reviews.title: Lack maintainance!! WORST!

reviews.text:
We stayed in this hotel for 3 days and 2 nights and in general it was fine. The room was pretty clean (could use some general maintenance though), the breakfast was good and the pool area was really nice! Unfortunately both the bar, the karaoke room and the nightclub was closed (don't know if it's always closed or we were just unlucky), so don't expect a party or a chill beer in the evening. Also the coffee in the room was expired, so the powder had turned into a weird paste kind of thing. Very nasty looking. 
I would come back to this hotel because of the nice pool, but don't expect anything extraordinary.
reviews.title: Okay

owner_response.text:
Dear Miss Sara H,

Warmest Greetings From Horison Sagita Balikpapan Hotel,

Many thanks for your choice to stay in this Hotel. We are certainly very grateful and appreciated for the time you have provided to review our hotel.

I have reviewed your comment and allow me to apologise for the inconvenience that you perceived during your stay, Please accept my sincere apology for the Coffee is not being able to meet your expectation, your comments are very valuable to the improvement of our Hotel.

Once again, many thanks and looking forward to welcoming you again in this Hotel. Feel free to contact me anytime for further information.

Best Regards,
Ichsan Harison
General Manager of Horison Sagita Balikpapan Hotel, Indonesia
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
First time travel to Balikpapan and came upon this through internet. 3 star hotel, nice pool. Extremely friendly staff at reception who helped me to get my phone back which I left in the taxi. Royal sized room, comfy bed and bathroom with bath tub. Bathroom amenities are very standard.
Breakfast for a 3 star hotel very OK. .Only 2 minor negative aspects I can think of: since this isn't a big hotel, there is no taxi pool in front of the hotel. And some money has to be spent to renew bed linen and towels.
Would I return? Yes, definitely.
reviews.title: strange place, good experience

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Williem

Warmest Greetings From Horison Sagita Balikpapan Hotel,

Many thanks on your choice to stay in this Hotel. We are certainly very grateful and appreciated for the time you have provided to review our hotel.

I have reviewed your comment and allow me to apologise for the inconvenience that you perceived during your stay, Please accept my sincere apology for not being able to meet your expectation, your comments are very valuable to the improvement of our Hotel.

Once again, words can't describe how thankful I am for your visit and kind review. looking forward to welcoming you again in this Hotel. Feel free to contact me anytime for further information.

Best Regards,
Ichsan Harison
General Manager of Horison Sagita Balikpapan Hotel, Indonesia
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: No complaints as well. Pretty good hotel. Breakfast was decent. Stayed here once only. Would not mind coming back. But don't think there are anything around the hotel which is within the walking distance.
reviews.title: Very good hotel

reviews.text: This hotel is quite big but they can not maintain the premises. The room was quite clean, but it has a moisture on the wall. Also a very thick dust on the window. Also the carpet needs a replacement already.
reviews.title: Need service improvement

reviews.text:
The hotel is placed in the city but not near to attractions (public transports aside of Taxi is a bit hard)
3 stars hotel with friendly staffs 
The pool is not too big but clean (minus that its placed next to meeting room, where people can stare)
The room are cozy and nice with rugs, but the bed is comfy, many plugs for charging electricity 
The bathroom needs to be really clean, a bit old though.
The towel is a little bit looking not so white, maybe itâ€™s time for a renewal
The breakfast is pretty good.
They have the most happening club in Balikpapan.
reviews.title: Simple hotel with happening club

reviews.text:
I was here in a business trip in May 2014. Staff reception was Ok and helpful. Room was large. 
Equipped with large size sofa. But it's not very clean room. There was stains and human hairs  on the sofa. Biscuits and dirts on the carpets. It seems like the housekeeping in a hurry to clean it up...
In the bathroom, looks not very clean. There are many stains and human hairs on the floor. Look at the Bathtub, it looks like 10 years old or more.
At night, I didn't know what happened in the next room, but there were very noisy sound like many crowd chatting...is the wall soundproof?
But overall it is a nice hotel and professional staff...I like to be here...
reviews.title: Nice room...but not very clean...

photos.caption: Single drinking glass for tooth brush
Crack Hole on the bath tub

reviews.text:
I had a very good sleep during my stay in Balikpapan at sagita hotel. Worst things:

1. The pillow sheet was stinks, really. Like some sweaty guy just slept on it and never changed the seet for 2 weeks.
2. Since i stayed there for 2 weeks, the housekeeper was started to get ignorat, i could see dust on the furniture although it wasn't thick but it's not healthy. Also didn't clean the bathtub properly.
3. The parking lot is a mess. It is hard to park there due to how they arrange the parking line.

Best things:
1. The bedroom has a good atmosphere to sleep, i slept really well during my 2 weeks stay there
2. The location is near to good restaurants like Ocean fish connection, Balikpapan plaza, e-walk, dandito.
3. Indonesian meal that they serve for breakfast are tasty, the rest are average. Every weekend they serve gado-gado as an alternative menu.
reviews.title: Good sleep, good location, must pay attention to cleanliness

reviews.text:
Staying in their business room, at first the hotel looks quite nice with minimalist but elegant style. The room is clean, quite spacious with sofa, TV and writing desk. Unfortunately the bath tub is broken, the water for shower are somehow yellow-ish color, the TV is still old fashion. Their WiFi worked for few hours during my stayed with a stable connection. However on the positive side, the staffs are nice and friendly. 

Location wise, although it still quite close to the Shopping Center, you have to take a cab to reach Balikpapan Plaza.

Will I going back? Most probably no....
reviews.title: Could Be Better Hotel

reviews.text: This hotel is bigtime dated, the linens stink. Tv is archaiec. Treadmill n exercise room didnt work, black mold, brown tap water and the food in Chopsticks was terrible, only reason i stayed here after one nite is my company paid for it, oh yea there is a mosque right beside it that at 430 am will blast you with wailing religous noise. The wifi pass is changed every two hours so you have to call the front desk and get new pass. Nightclub down stairs that vibrates whole building with music, the staff is nice though, they just dont have anything to work with.
reviews.title: Worst hotel ever

reviews.text: Fancy hotels often have this problem: the staff are not given any training to be able to solve your problems or to think outside the narrow box that management constucts for them. Hotel Sagita is another one of those places. The rooms are nice, spacious, and the pool area, though lacking atmosphere, is slick and modern. However, a couple of issues with staff really undermined the experience. The fitness centre is mostly broken machines. It was ok, but not sure I would return.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, service average

reviews.text:
Its rather expensive for the 3stars hotel.
IDR 590.000 a night for the Executive Room,including breakfast by hotel voucher from KAHA. 
Hotel website says it must be IDR 1.100.000

Plus value : 
1. Near the sepinggan airport, just IDR 45.000 by cab for 15 minutes
2. Clean and comfort room
3. Large room with sofa, bathup and modern minimaliz concept

Minus value : 
1. Not really friendly welcome at the front office
2. No free wifi
3. Has no view due to neighboring building walls
4. Quite noisy from the 'Redsquare' nightclub on the basement (don't the hotel want to try solving it?)
5. Poor breakfast :( There are just fried noodle and rice. Coffee? Ask or you'll never get it. Please add several menus!
reviews.title: Worthed Value

reviews.text: Nice hotel with good value for money. Downside are old TV sets and wear and tear of the hotel. With small touch ups they could gain a lot. Internet did not work for a week due to a lightning strike which was bad - only lobby had available wifi internet. The 'Redsquare' nightclub is nice and in the basement of the hotel.
reviews.title: Nice hotel with nighclub inside

reviews.text: I have stayed for 4 nights in this 3 star hotel. The staff at the front reception were very polite and efficient. The breakfast is also good and my room came with free soft drinks and tidbits from the mini bar. Had an enjoyable stay.
reviews.title: Clean,spacious and comfortable room.

name: D'primahotel Balikpapan
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
address: 78 Jl. Mt Haryono, Balikpapan 76114 Indonesia

reviews.text: Staying 4 night in this hotel located in Balikpapan. Room was clean , bed comfortable, pillow x 2 is nice . Staff from security, reception were friendly. Special thank you to lady at the bar , is so nice and friendly. Smoking room inside for coffee. Hotel does not accept cash , but only credit card / debit card. Parking spacious. The only thing can added in is that bathroom should have a rubber mat because coming out from bath tub is very slipery. Because the standing shower is attached bath tub. Other is all excellent.
reviews.title: Clean Property Balikpapan

reviews.text:
Pelayanan ramah dan tempat sangat nyaman
Tempat dipusat kota untuk bisnis sangat cocok sekali 
Untuk kebandara juga dekat,
Kamar bersih
Pelayanan bagus sekali
Tempat nyaman tidak bising cocok untuk istirahat
reviews.title: D'prima hotel balikpapan

name: Grand Tiga Mustika Hotel
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
address: Jl. H ARS. Muhammad no. 51, Balikpapan 76112 Indonesia

reviews.text:
It was a good hotel with friendly and helpfull staffs. I walked-in on Saturday afternoon (7/May/16) as I was disappointed by another hotel which I booked a month before through the reservation agent or its staff. So I walked nearby and found Grand Tiga Mustika Hotel. The receptionist, Ms. Yuliana, welcomed warmly, provided clear information and made a good offer! I took the family room with reasonable rate including dinner and breakfast, local newspaper and wifi connection. Hotel has pool and close access to main road and Bakapai Park.

There were minor issues which I could tolerate, such as, dinner needs dessert and hot/cold drinks for completion. Telephone and mirror lighting were not working but was soon fixed by engineering. We were 3 adults but there were only 2 bath towels but it was delivered soon when requested. Overall it didn't ruin my stay there.

Nice courtesy and service too by Sisju Adi, responsible for the Housekeeping but he's quite going around the area. Any inquiries were also delivered to room immediately.
Good hotel and staffs service to stay! Will stay there again when visiting my brother and recommend to my friends.
reviews.title: Comfortable room & helpful staffs

reviews.text:
I stayed 1 night yesterday with my family . In the evening my room was not too cool, so i complaining to the staff. After an hour the staff recomended to change room. But after i change the room, the problem is still the same. And in the middle the night i complaining again, but staff just recomended to change the room, but the room that we want to go is having the same problem. In this morning when i tell my problem to my friend that alsoy stay there in 4th and 5th florr are having the same problem
So to grand tiga mustika hotel, please fix the air con so your customer enjoy stay in your hotel
Tx
reviews.title: Not cool room

reviews.text:
I stayed at room 521 for 3 nights for work. I asked for non smoking room. When I entered the room, the room reeks of cigarette smells. The room was not so clean and looks old-fashioned. 

At the night, it's very noisy, like someone dragging chairs outside the room. So I and my friend can't sleep well. 

The breakfast was lack of variation.
reviews.title: Not recomended

reviews.text:
I must admit this hotel is far away from nice accommodation. However, if you just want to stay for one night to get some sleep, then you're OK. My company booked me for one night just because they cannot find any hotels available during weekdays. I stayed at room 317, big room with extra bed, but not so clean and looks so old fashioned, and although it has a great sea-view. But I got problem with air condition, very old ones not really comfortable, also the TV remote was broken, so I have ask to be repaired, even they have to change with new one.  
Breakfast is so poor, little variations of food, poor service. Definitely, I am not going back to this hotel for vacation.
reviews.title: A so so hotel

reviews.text: I stayed here for 2 nights in order to work and vacation. comfortable hotel to rest. food offered is also quite tasty. no pool. easy to travel anywhere, close to the city center. do not regret staying here.
reviews.title: Comfortable hotel

reviews.text:
I must admit that after reading all the bad reviews, I was rather worried about my stay at this Hotel.
However, all my fears proved other wise.
Plus points:-
Very close to down town (walking distance)
Very clean and comfortable rooms and bath
Fairly good swimming pool.
Fairly good spread for breakfast (for suited for the local palate)
Good and polite staff
Minus points:-
Cannot think of any thing and am wondering why all the negative publicity about this place.
Would definately stay there again.
reviews.title: A good hotel for the price you pay

reviews.text:
I guess this is an Ood worn hotel, looks like unmaintained sepecially its rooms.
After one night there i move to other hotel in front of it, the different is like night and day.
The room is large enough but dirty and old.
Breakfast is poor with less option.
reviews.title: not up to my expextation

reviews.text: hotel ini memiliki ruangan hotel dengan plafon yang tinggi namun penerangan dalam kamar sangat minim, dan meja rias dilengkapi dengan lampu neon putih, ambience is a big zero..not to mention, gaudy.  The corridor of the hotel, once you step of out of the lift, gives me creepy feeling and reminds me of the scene from Jack Nicholson's  'Shining' the Movie....Side table tidak dibersihkan dengan benar karena sisa2 sirop yang sticky bisa terlihat, the telephone collected dusts,  and what is worse, the pillows smell awful!!  I can tell the pillow cases are not changed from the previous guests.  Although on the surface, the bathroom looks clean, the shower area is grown with molds!  Needless to say that being in the hospitality business, you have to pay great attention to little details.  The lobby reeks of cigarettes smell as people freely smoke in the lobby, oblivious to other people who are subjected to smoke, same thing in the coffee shop area.  I dont know whether there is no regulation about public smoking in East Kalimantan or these smokers are just being plain selfish....  all in all, this hotel is a no no...
reviews.title: not recommended

reviews.text: Staying for only a few hours yet i feel want to get out of the hotel. The wifi if SLOW! The room's quite dirty, there's cigarette butts on the floor of the toilet. A lot of water leakage marks on the ceiling. The remote control feels oily.
reviews.title: Bad

reviews.text: hotel yang nyaman, makanannya lezat, kamarnya juga luas, kamar mandi sdh lengkap dengan bathtub, dekat dengan mall dan pusat perbelanjaan. pas berseberangan dengan hotel grand senyiur klo ke balikpapan saya akan kesini lagi
reviews.title: hotel grand 3 mustika

reviews.text: Hotel ini hotel tua, nuansa etnis cina sangat kental dari interiornya. Kamarnya bersih, suasana hotel tenang, tidak berisik. Kelengkapan kamar dan kamar mandi baik. Sarapan baik, hanya cita rasanya kurang. Staf hotel ramah. Tempat parkir luas. Dekat tempat makan, mini market dan ATM.
reviews.title: Hotel dgn nuansa cina

reviews.text:
Tempatnya cukup strategis berdekatan dengan beberapa hotel, dekat dengan pusat kota dan mall.
Fasilitasnya cukup lengkap, sangat nyaman dan cocok untuk liburan keluarga. Hanya saja liftnya perlu perbaikan.
Tarif terjangkau untuk menengah
reviews.title: Hotel yang nyaman untuk liburan keluarga

reviews.text: Selama ini menginap di hotel berbintang di Balikpapan tidak pernah saya mengalami yg seburuk ini, kamar mandi bau, sofa yg kotor air panas juga tidak jalan selama seminggu saya menginap disini, pelayan juga terlihat tidak melayani dengan sepenuh hati hanya sekedar formalitas pekerjaan mereka saja, saya sangat tidak merekomendasikan hotel ini karena ini adalah hotel dengan bintang yg sudah redup
reviews.title: Hotel lama dan tidak terawat

reviews.text: kesan pertama di lobby sangat menarik. hotel yang besar dan memberikan pilihan harga yang beragam. lantai tiga memiliki balkon dengan latar pantai dan kapal tongkang hilir mudik. lokasinya sangat strategis, dekat dengan taman kuliner. satu hal yang kurang adalah akses internetnya tidak ok.
reviews.title: Lumayan

reviews.text: Dari luar hotel ini terkesan hotel lama namun setelah sy tanya driver katanya lumayan baru. Pas masuk memang nuansa etnik cina, dan furniture-furniture juga memang ernik. Kamar luas dan suasana tenang kebetulan sy dikasi lantai 3 dan sudut view kebawah liat kolam renang. Cozy juga hotel ini dengan nuansa etnik cina, recomended mungkin yang akan nginap disini pilih lantai atas biar bisa liat view kota balikpapan
reviews.title: Hotel nuansa chinese

reviews.text: Hotel ini berada tepat di depan Hotel Gran Senyiur balik papan.. masuk kehotel disambut dengan patung dewi kwan im.. kursi kursi cina.. ruang lobi yg luas... kamar nya lumayan nyaman.. tapi waktu kami mau nuju balik ke hotel habis jalan-jalan.. pak supir tolong anter ke hotel mega mustika.... * ha.. salah omong. Emang penyanyi dangdut..
reviews.title: Tiga mustika bukan mega mustika

reviews.text: Hotel ini berdiri sudah cukup lama, lokasinya persis di depan Hotel Gran Senyiur Balikpapan. Kamar dan pelayanan stafnya standar. Harganya relatif mahal untuk kondisi kamar dan fasilitas yang ditawarkan.
reviews.title: Hotel standar dengan harga terlalu tinggi

reviews.text: Pertama memasuki hotel ini masih terasa jika hotel ini lama tidak ramai dikunjungi orang. Ketika masuk ke dalam kamar, ada beberapa fasilitas yang sudah tidak layak. Seakan-akan terpaksa diganti. Menu makanan lumayan bervariatif dan harganya lumayan terjangakau.
reviews.title: Hotel lama Fasilitas lumayan
