reviews.text:
+ untuk kelas bintang emapt, hotel ini relatif murah. dengan suasana tenang dilengkapi kolam renang untuk anak-anak dan dewasa. perabotan dan pintu dari kayu menambah kesan menarik. termasuk lobi yang luas dan front office yang ramah.
- lokasi agak tinggi dari jalan raya utama membuat hotel ini harus bersaing dengan hotel lainnya yang ada di bawah dan lebih dekat dengan jalan raya utama.
reviews.title: tenang dan relatif murah

name: Zurich Hotel Balikpapan
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
address: Jln. Jendral Sudirman no. 81, Balikpapan 76114 Indonesia

reviews.text: We had an order via Travel Agent for three nights but due to the guest being affected by Covid our guest had to leave the hotel early. In this case, we ask to hotel that the remaining nights can be canceled without a penalty fee, but the hotel is very uncooperative and for the three nights are still subject to a penalty fee. It's really a pity even though we have a lot of official trips in Balikpapan and we will not use this hotel again for our business purposes.
reviews.title: Hotel is not cooperative

reviews.text: Some kind old fashioned three stars hotels that may be your favorites. Large room, bathtub, ceiling to floor windows, high ceiling, good housekeeping, morning newspapers, refrigerator, hotel sleepers, large parking area including basements, 2 elevators, emergency torch lights, nice sea views, close to airport - mall - my branch office, located on protocols street, various tv channels, hot water, the rates are low budget, breakfast menu are complete but the taste just so so, there is door man and so helpful on other side less hospitality for restaurant man staff, and hotel walls outdoors in maintenance so there is a lot of noice and craft man hanging on scaffolding outside. after all this hotel is recommended.
reviews.title: Old fashion hotel

reviews.text:
Having to overnight in Balikpapan before catching the morning flight to Tj. Redab the next morning, this hotel was as convenient as they come. It was just about 20 min . from the airport and another 20 min to the restaurant we wanted to go for dinner.
Relatively inexpensive, tidy and with Wi-fi, it was all I needed for a short lay-over.

Room decor could be better though. I felt it was a bit tacky.
reviews.title: Good enough for an over-night stay

reviews.text: Centrally located. Rooms are quite & spacious. Complementary breakfast has limited menu for foreigners. English speaking staff are not available at the reception, which some times pose a problem.Good elevation & sound sleep.
reviews.title: Good Stay

reviews.text:
PROS - The whole hotel was presented fantastically and the rooms were well maintained and absolutely beautiful. The views from our room were amazing. We ate both breakfast and dinner in the restaurant, both days we were there, and the meals were great. The location was great, close to the airport and the major shopping areas. We went to Balikpapan, because my grandfather was wounded there in WWII, so we has a list of military sites we specifically see. We tried to arrange a driver to take us to these places, but had trouble finding a company who spoke English. We asked the staff at reception and they arranged for one of their own shuttle drivers to take us around.

CONS - Our electronic room cards kept malfunctioning, so we spent a lot of time going up and down to reception to get into our room. Apparently the card system has difficulty understanding people staying more than one night. The staff's English was limited and we often had to wait until a certian person was working before we could get someone to understand what we were asking.
reviews.title: Fantastic place to stay to enjoy everything Balikpapn has to offer

reviews.text: We were waiting for a flight for 2 days and this was a good choice for our stay. Good big room, comfortable beds (with cotton sheets), good staff, good restaurant, good location (practically right opposite a huge mall with shops and restaurants). Cable tv with HBO movies in the room, and a huge buffet breakfast. On the outside it looks like a 4 star hotel, and it is really trying to be that. When the tv seemed to have bad reception they sent maintenance to sort it immediately (I was travelling with my son so cable was quite important for me on this trip). Overall excellent value for money and a good choice in this city.
reviews.title: Excellent choice in this city

reviews.text:
this hotel got low prices, not far from airport, nearby big shopping mall. and quite nice and comfy rooms. the staffs was extremely helpful, albeit there was no staff available anywhere near restaurant area when we have breakfast, and not necessarily early breakfast because I had breakfast on 7.30 local time. 

the only downsides was the noise I experienced on my visit, they were doing a construction work, and the noise crept in the room. not to mention the contractor workers decided to have rest and chat among them with loud noises in the hallways.

overall, for a budget, you will have good deals
reviews.title: nice, but old and noisy

reviews.text: For a really low price, I was seduced by the magnificent room and the delicious breakfast. Ideally located, this hotel deserves praises. Very nice and welcoming staff. A pleasure to stay there. However, poor WiFi connection.
reviews.title: Charming hotel

reviews.text: As mention above, this property is an old hotel still trying to exist in this fast changing city...located in centre of the city, first impression when arrived at night that it was dim, check in process was fast, book thru online travel....room is clean bed need replacement...bathroom surprisingly had bathtub but kinda dirty....breakfast is ok only under staff....for the rates their charging you can't complaint much...
reviews.title: Another old property

reviews.text: The hotel is not too far from the airport. Enough fun for those of you who want a break immediately after a flight or long journey. The standard room is a twin bed, so if you go alone and prefer to sleep on a mattress that big do not choose a standard room. restaurant is pleasant enough with a diverse menu. Pretty good for a low-cost hotel.
reviews.title: Good hotel for a low cost hotel

reviews.text: for a relatively large room, there is only one slipper for two people staying. hallway between the elevator and the room was very dark, especially on the third floor. it is advisable to replace the lamp lighter. thank you
reviews.title: Large room

reviews.text:
I choose this hotel because my family weeding is held on the building next to this hotel.

The hotel itself is good. Though it didn't have swimming pool. The room is spacious (we're on superior room). The AC on the hotel is a bit warm. But in room is cold. The WiFi is adequate. Though I cannot login for my second device.

This hotel is only 5-8 minutes walk to Balikpapan Super Block. Huge shopping malls. And also a lot of traditional snack available. So you won't have to worry about what to bring as gifts.
reviews.title: Good location

reviews.text: Nice budget hotel with the view of the city. Even though we found the neighbor roof around the hotel. It has clean room, unique bathroom and nice  hospitality. This hotel is located about 10 km from the airport and 1 km from the city. The only problem is parking area. It quite difficult to find parking space and some time you should park your car on public road side.
reviews.title: Budget Hotel

reviews.text:
I was stayed here on my business trip to Balikpapan.
It has strategics location and near Balikpapan Superblock where my business destination was.
And the hotel is standing just next to the Gift Store, so I went to the gift store to buy some gifts to give to my relatives in Surabaya.
reviews.title: Good stay

reviews.text:
I stay one night for business trip, they gave me the 5th floor for non-smoking room. Room is large enough, with complete amenities and their location is very strategic, near the E-Walk Balikpapan Super Block. But it seems less maintaining for their bathroom.
Breakfast is adequate for me, a lot of variety of food, rice, rawon, fish and some vegetables. Coffee and tea also available.
reviews.title: Less maintaining

reviews.text:
After a quick visit to a work site north of Balikpapan I was booked into the Zurich Hotel. The check in process was efficient and on complaining I'd been alocated a twin bedded room was quickly allocated a pleasant room with king size bed on the 5th floor. The room was quite large with a work desk and great TV. The bathroom was quite basic but large. The air-con and WiFi worked well.
Trying to get dinner wasn't easy because most of the buffet was running out and I couldn't find a clean table in the restaurant so I ordered dinner for my room. The food was quite disappointing and I left most of it. I'd have gone out for dinner but the surrounding area was quite dark with broken pavements so I decided against that.
Breakfast wasn't a happy experience as almost every table was occupied by people smoking so I found a table outside for an excellent omelette cooked just for me.
reviews.title: A night in Balikpapan

reviews.text: although the smell of cigarette smoke on the floor of my stay and rooms but in general the room was clean enough. Only when they wanted breakfast I saw no more seats left for me, I sat on the sofa end which is not the place for breakfast to wait till there a vacant seats. The breakfast menu is mediocre.
reviews.title: somewhat less well maintained, not enough seating for breakfast

reviews.text: I stayed in this hotel just for one night. acording to me the room was standart but there was nice bathtub,there was a making coffe and tea also. The staff was friendly.; The location was good if you want to spend your time in balikpa. Location near the mall and public transportation
reviews.title: Not bad

reviews.text: The rooms were dirty, service standard was poor and noise from traffic and mosques was intolerable. The included breakfast consisted of over spiced chicken extremities, glutinous noodles and cold boiled rice.
reviews.title: Very unprofessionally managed

reviews.text:
Recommended place to stay if u want to spent ur day in the heart of Balikpapan,this hotel placed near Balikpapan superblock and E-Walk Mall
Wide room and nice ambience 
The room rate is cheapeer than the hotel with the same facilities also large guest room with bathub in all type of room
reviews.title: Good location and ambience

name: Hotel Mega Lestari
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
address: Jl. Ars, Muhammad RT. 27 no. 32, Balikpapan 76113 Indonesia

reviews.text: staff were OK but hotel was very run down. staff said the cheaper rooms were in a separate block without any lift and open corridors. they also face onto a huge construction site which operated as early as 630am some days and sometimes finished as late as 10.30pm. Dirty run down room with hair and cockroaches in bathroom. only positives were good location, good aircon and good wifi in room. sleeping was very poor due to no inroom sound insulation aswell as building work. there is a small swimming pool but wasnt very clean. stay elsewhere - but balikpapan isnt a great option for tourists in general.  breakfast was soso, as chicken/meat was recooked and gave me stomach problems... fruit was good
reviews.title: Hotel marketed as a 4 star, but a poor 3 star in reality backing onto contruction site

photos.caption: sold as a 4 star hotel... no way, expedia refunded
building site by rooms at mega lestari
4 star luxury at hotel mega lestari balikpapan

reviews.text:
A 3 stars hotel with real spacious room for its class. Located in a great spot of the city near Bekapai Park where you can find various local street food stalls, and also near Balikpapan Trade Center and City Great Mosque, Attaqwa.

The hotel is a little bit odd, quaint to be frank, have murals on its entire walls. The environment is cozy, or maybe too quiet for a hotel. Breakfast is average, pool: nice, meeting room: small,  and I hope cleanliness can be improved. My room vent is dusty, and the blower too... they really need to improve for sure.
reviews.title: spacious room @ city center

reviews.text: Huge comfortable rooms with aircon and cable tv. Great location right near food stalls which may even be a night market, and a large shopping mall and loads of shops. Donâ€™t expect much English from the staff though they try hard and are really friendly and try to help with everything. There is a swimming pool but the water is quite cold. Decent restaurant serving great food and a good buffet breakfast. You can ask for eggs and they are happy to cook them for you). Great choice to stay here and excellent value for money.
reviews.title: Excellent value for money

reviews.text:
I booked this hotel a month ago and when I arrived there Saturday afternoon (7/May/16) a young lady in black uniform welcomed in a rude way and unproffesionally! but then a young man (receptionist) in red uniform took over and checked my reservation on system. That time the lobby situation was crowded of wedding event and I saw the announcement on reception desk that the event was held on pool side, which I and Family could not use the pool facility that evening, It was a great concern as I promised my son and my niece that evening to swim and enjoy pool facility, as the next day I must fly back to Bali! I decided to leave and not to continue staying and moved to another hotel nearby, still on the same street.

I directly wrote email that night to let them know my reason and disappointment but none of them get back to me until I'm writing this review now. I hope to stay at that hotel but with this experience it's difficult to be back again!
reviews.title: Service was not delivered!

reviews.text:
This hotel is close to pasar klandasan, night culinary around hotel at taman bekapai park.
Spacious room, clean, quiet, free in room wifi is strong. Breakfast is average. Hotel has 2 lift but it often run 1 only.
Outdoor pool usually also used by a club member from outside hotel, look crowded at afternoon/evening.
reviews.title: Interest location

reviews.text:
The good part is location wise its one of the best hotel in Balikpapan..
Probably this is the only positive feedback I can share about this hotel..

There are cockroaches in my room (505); this is my 2nd night in this hotel.. every night I have kill few cockroaches before going to bed!!!!!
In the breakfast they serving some colored water in the name of fruit juice!! And they claimed to be a 3 star hotel!!! How come???!!!

This is my first time in this hotel and I'm preety sure this is the last time.. 
In this location I can have ibis in this price range which is 10tims better than this...
The interior of the hotel is so boring...

Sorry managment of Mega Lestari, you must have renovate and develop very quickly...
reviews.title: Probably worst hotel in Balikpapan in this price range

reviews.text: the hotel location is good in the down town and the decoration mixed Chinese and Dayak and  for the room little bit old fashion but still comfortable. The guest amenities still standard for the hotel,but the room not sound proof so we can hear the next room.over all the is not bad for 3 star hotel
reviews.title: 3 star with unique decoration

reviews.text:
Old hotel but aestethic 

Variasi breakfast lumayan banyak dan sesuai dengan bintang hotel. Terimakasih ats service dari mbak meilinda. Saya dari surabaya merasa tersanjung karna diperkenalkan wisata dan oleh2 khas balikapapan. Great service from mbk meilinda ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘
reviews.title: Old hotel but great service

reviews.text:
Hotelnya dari luar nampak tua, tp kebersihannya tetap terjaga. Lokasinya jg strategis. Kamar cukup luas dan bersih. Kekurangannya, sprei dan sarung bantal masih bau. Selain itu, menu sarapan jg gak enak.

Mohon ditingkatkan lagi pelayanannya terutama makanannya.
reviews.title: Hotel tua tapi bersih

reviews.text: Kamar luas dengan harga yang terjangkau. Kamarnya juga sangat bersih, Stafnya ramah. Fasilitas lengkap ada wifi, kolam renang, dan ruang rapat. Menu sarapan enak Namun bagian lobbynya kurang terang. Tempat strategis di tengah kota dekat dengan pantai dan mall
reviews.title: Kamar luas dan murah

reviews.text:
Onze kamer was oke maar je ziet aan alles dat het hotel gedateerd is. We vonden alles redelijk schoon. De locatie is wel fijn. Onze vrienden hadden warm water uit de douche, wij helaas niet.
Ontbijt was onbegrepen maar simpel.
reviews.title: Oke

reviews.text: Hotelnya walaupun kecil tapi fasilitasnya cukup lengkap,kolam renang ada,tapi sayanya bagian daerah lobynya kurang penerangan,lukisannya jgn di buat yg serem" dong hhe harga terjangkau,tempat strategis tengah kota ðŸ‘ðŸ»
reviews.title: Receptionnya ramah

reviews.text:
Kamar luas dengan tembok model batu bata, antik. Hanya saja kurang kedap suara untuk yang swing area. 
Makan malam di angkringannya cukup lengkap menunya, dan harga bersahabat. 
Sarapan lumayan. 
Hanya saja staf di resto kurang ramah sedikit.
reviews.title: Kamar luas

reviews.text: Waktu ada pelatihan dari Kominfo kami di berikan fasilitas menginap di hotel ini. Suasananya lumayan. Waktu itu saya diberikan kamar tepat disamping atas kolam renang lupa kamar nomor berapa. Padahal pengen sekali di kamar yang atas biar bisa liat view laut. Pelayananya bagus sangat ramah dan untuk sarapan nya menunya oke lah.
reviews.title: Menginap di Hotel Mega Lestari

reviews.text: Terpaksa menginap di family room, padahal trip sendirian. Ruangan luas banget dengan 3 bed kecil. Agak kurang nyaman karena posisi di pojok, dan posisi saklar jauh dari pintu. Jadi harus masuk dulu dlm kondisi gelap utk menyalakan lampu. Internetnya sangat jelek. tidak pernah nyambung
reviews.title: Family room, 3 bed for 1 person

reviews.text: Untuk kesekian kalinya menginap kembali dihotel ini, seperti biasa karena aksesnya mudah terjangkau dari mana saja.. Tidak ada perubahan pada desain hotel ini, kebersihan masih tetap terjaga. Menu sarapan pun masih standar dan tidak banyak variasi..
reviews.title: ..Kembali Lagi..

reviews.text: Hotel ini berdiri sudah cukup lama dan fasilitasnya standar namun lokasi cukup strategis di tengah kota Balikpapan tepatnya di belakang Taman Bekapai. Di sekitar hotel ini juga banyak tersebar rumah makan dan restoran tepatnya menyeberang jalan dari Taman Bekapai.
reviews.title: Hotel di belakang Taman Bekapai

reviews.text: Kamar bagus dan luas. Ruang meeting ada yang besar cocok untuk pertemuan dengan banyak tamu. Akses kemana-mana juga dekat dengan pusat kota. Mau jalan-jalan malam ada Taman Bekapai yang dekat hotel. Lumayan untuk cuci mata.. Parkiran juga tertata di basement hotel.. So Good..
reviews.title: Akses Mudah

reviews.text: bagus, namun tidak terlalu sempurna. pelayanan cepat, kamar bersih dan luas, namun  dari sisi perabot, televisi masih dalam bentuk tabung. menurut saya harus diganti dengan yg lebih update tv nya agar tambah nyaman. thanks mega lestari
reviews.title: good

reviews.text: Saya terpaksa tinggal di hotel ini karena disediakan panitia pelatihan. Kekecewaan pertama, laundry yang sudah dicuci tidak langsung ditaruh di kamar tapi menunggu tamu datang. Saat tidak diminta, laundry sampai 2 hari tidak diantar. Kedua, selama saya menginap kamar dan kamar mandi tidak disapu, hanya membereskan kasur saja. Dan saya menginap 5 hari lho...bayangkan saja kotornya. Betul2 mengecewakan...
reviews.title: Kamar tidak pernah disapu

name: OYO 1034 Pondok Mulia Guest House
address: Jl, Keruang, Gn Bahagia, Balikpapan 76114 Indonesia

name: Pantai Mentari Compound
address: Jl. Mulawarman no. 6, RT. 5, Balikpapan Indonesia

reviews.text:
Mid of March 2018, Me and my family were staying and held a Family Gathering here.
We booked 12 rooms include hall for the party. All went smooth and everybody's leaving with lovely experience.

The apartments are spacious and nice. While the adults enjoy the party at the hall with beach view, our kids can enjoy their time in the swimming pool (just next to the hall).

We might staying here again and sure other family would love it too!
reviews.title: Good Place for Families

reviews.text: 40 of us stay here for 3 days retreat. It is a nice and calm beach. It also have resort which very clean. Great place to spend your holiday if you want a calm holiday. Wanna visit this place later with my friends!
reviews.title: Nice place

name: Astara Hotel Balikpapan
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
address: Balikpapan Superblock. Jl. Jend Sudirman No. 47 Pentacity Shopping Venue, Balikpapan 76114 Indonesia

reviews.text: the room was adequately clean. the room is so small with that price it's not really worth it. the interior needs upgrade. breakfast was awesome with abundant of choices. i love the view from my room it's amazing and i can watch live bsb pantai live music from my room. the air conditioner is not too cold. nice location, connected to Pentacity mall.
reviews.title: family

reviews.text: It's nice to stay here because everything is here, you don't need to go out anywhere around the hotel, there are 2 large malls and BSB beach just walked, there are many choices of places to eat, the complete package can lie down and take a leisurely walk to the mall. the rooms are quite spacious, breakfast is yummy okay varied, strategic location and very good service. Recommended to stay here
reviews.title: Hotel arrounds Mall

reviews.text:
I checked in on 11 PM. There was no receptionist at the ground floor at my tower. The security told me that the 24 hour receptionist is on the 7th floor at the other tower. I must walked through water boom area that only partially covered by roof and that time the rain was falling. It could be better if I enter the hotel through the other tower. 
At the receptionist I must wait around 10 minutes because they were handling another guests. When it was my turn they found my room have been registered by my company but they were not sure whether someone have been checked in to my room or not. Then they must check directly to my room and I had to wait for another 10 minutes. After got my key I must walk through the water boom area again and it was still raining.
Finally I could enter my room, but I found the blanket have some stains and the mat in the bath room was really dirty. I just opened the blanket and put away the mat. The room was small. The shower area in the bath room was also very narrow.
When I wanted to check out on 7 AM I called the receptionist where should I check out and they said I must check out at the same receptionist with last night because the receptionist on my tower was not open yet. So I must walk again through the water boom area and it was still raining.
reviews.title: Bad experience

photos.caption: Wet access through water boom area

reviews.text:
We have Booked the hotel few days ago with their reservation, somehow Upon Check in our reservation were not listed, so we have to wait a while to get a room, once we enter the room we get a room with construction view and workers in front of the balcony, the room was not well prepared, we booked two rooms and one of the rooms don't have a curtain and another room wastafel sink hole were broken... also we booked for 1 Double Bed + 1 Twin Bed, but somehow they gave us only Double bed

So we need to change room, but when changing the room they did not send a bellboy to help us with our luggage... so we manage to drag it all on our own.... Also the staff who escorted us dont even give a brief explanation about the room and facility, they just handover the key and whalla gone right away... Now the breakfast was just not good, most of the meal were tasteless and very2 mediocre... Just not worth it for the Price of room that we Pay... Many other better options for similar or even cheaper room rates

Staff at the front office were also not so friendly, might need more training on handling customer, when we say we have book a room with Mr. A on reservation department, and they replied Have You Paid? (With an accusations tone as if the room were not booked because we havent paid for it) meanwhile the reservation staff said we can pay upon arrival at the front desk.

The Positive side was that the rooms and hotel area are very clean and well maintain, they have big swimming pool with slide available, and the location is very strategic located inside the Balikpapan Super Block where there are plenty of shops / mall / restaurant / sports facility/ Movie Theater and others
reviews.title: Not Worth The Price - Staff Need more Training

reviews.text: After 3rd times visit, now it become the Worst 4 star hotel in Balikpapan. Dirty bed cover when entering room, also the toilet. When complain to the reception and housekeeping, the're not responsive. It takes too long. There is duty manager phone, but no one response. It very dissapointed after the 3rd visit to this hotel. No more stay with this hotel next time visit Balikpapan.
reviews.title: Dissapoint 4 star hotel

reviews.text:
I class this as a mudguard on a car .... shinny on top but muddy underneath...... 5 nights here is more than enough..... royal suite .. not !!!! .... very average even by Indonesian standards.... room service very slow ... house keeping even slower...,. Running repairs to everything while I was there .... food yer that was a plus ... but when you have to teach the girl that does your eggs how to make pouched eggs ... there's a problem!!!!! ... cheap enough but ! Location pretty central.... plaza not far away ... taxi service ok but paying for parking every time you get a taxi to the front door ..
 mmmmmm !!! .....staff friendly enough to help ...., pool .. to much clohorine ... I wonder why ... maybe it was to hide the smell ...
reviews.title: Quick stop over

owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: Was on a business trip to Balikpapan, happened to see this hotel in the Pentacity mall campus, made arrangements for booking. Reached on a Sunday evening, taxi from airport to hotel 70k. Hotel has two entrances, the North Tower (adjacent to Starbucks of pentacity mall) and South tower (opposite to Ruby Towers apartments). Reception functions at the 7th floor for both the towers separately.  The Aqua swimming pool cum theme park with water slides is just between reception and restaurant Aqva Palm. Check in was swift. Room at 11th floor access through elevator by card access only. Good safety. Rooms looked new, toiletries OK (dental kits, shower cap, shaving kit, lotion, comb, disposable bag for sanitary purposes, ear buds, etc) Hand wash lotion canister, shampoo canister and body gel canister were available and topped up regularly. Towels though not great quality were neat, clean and a pair kept. Slippers were of surprisingly good quality with the Astara mark. At the south tower were sea view rooms with Ruby towers blocking the complete view. Room service was fine, restaurant bfast is OK. Food taste is fine but variety could be brought in. The restaurant has a lounge bar, good with arrangements for smoking outside. I believe the rates could be brought down a little for a parity to value you get. I would appreciate the Malaysian duty manager who stepped in over a confusion at the restaurant on room charging. Good person with great presence of mind. Restaurant and bar staff are working hard, especially that little girl at the kitchen with a Gilbab and Lion, the bar tender. My appreciation to Dewi and all restaurant staff for locating my credit cards box at the restaurant and bringing it to my room. I would have been in trouble otherwise. Good honest people. In all I enjoyed my stay there which was for almost 12days. Will book again if I need to visit the place.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, service ok, excellent location

Regards

Astara Hotel Balikpapan

reviews.text:
I was staying in Astara Aeropolis Hotel for 4 days. Upon arrival, the check in counter at the hotel is cramped and filled with lots of people. This is due to the festive season. But the customer service staff at the check in counter were always smiling and patient.
When I was in my room, the wifi had connecting issue and there was no instruction given on how to function the TV as well. The shower area water drainage was blocked but the staff was patient to get all fixed up. 
This hotel is great for family but not for anyone looking for facilities. The Swimming pool is more of a public pool. The place is open to the public. The dinning area is too small for a hotel that attracts family. 
But I must thank Mr. Erik, he is one of the best service duty manager that I had ever come across in all the hotels that I had stayed in Indonesia. He took the trouble to service you at his best and came to the room personally to ensure that everything run well for me. 
The company should treasure this manager. He deserved to be promoted so that he could lead more people to give quality service like him.
reviews.title: Good Customer service, lack of facilities

owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: For my business trip and as a solo traveller, so i need the hotel with the best location. Astara is connected with 2 big shopping malls: Pentacity and Ewalk; it helped me much to support my need for leisure walking after my hard work day.
reviews.title: Well recommended

owner_response.text:
Dear Camper13104030890

Thank you for your feedback sir, we are glad that you had a wonderful experience on your previous stay, it is our job to keep improving all the services & facilities in our hotel. We hope that we can provide you with more better services on your next visit.

Regards

Astara Hotel Balikpapan
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.partner_attribution: Review collected in partnership with this hotel

reviews.text:
The check in was alrite, not too quick as we arrived during busy hour.

We got a room in 11th floor. we didnt get our request: twin bedroom, we got a double bed instead.

Our short nap was interrupted since we found lots of ants in our bed, coming from somewhere near the headboard. 

We also found a leftover from previous guest in the drawer. 

We contacted the front office (ms marini) to sort things out. the ants seem gone from the headboard, as the housekeeping sprayed some anti-ants-spray there. Unfortunately, some dead ants are still in the bedroom, hiding in the blanket. we reported it again to ms. marini.

Let's hope they wont disturb us tonite. fingers crossed.
reviews.title: Beware of the ants!

owner_response.text:
Dear Indsoe

Thank you for your feedback sir, we do apoligise for the inconvenience that you and your family had experience, it is our job to keep improving all the services & facilities in our hotel. We hope that we can provide you with a better services on your next visit.

Regards

Astara Hotel Balikpapan
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
The one star is for the staff, always smiling and friendly. 
Two thirds of the hotel is still under construction while for the finished part you could already start demolition work and build it new. 
Family room small on size, windows cant be closed properly, everything already worn out, water dropping from aircondition, once raining water enters in the hallways..
Especially housekeeping urgently needs some basic cleaning training.... the room was very dirty on arrival.
You can have an average breakfast, once you have crossed the waterpark ( for which you should pay (discount). Breakfast is noisy, as construction workers are constantly hammering above.
There is currently no private pool for hotel guests so do not expect to get a chair near the pool. No showers could have been found near to pool. So seems no one in showering before entering pool.
To sum up: very poor quality of the building contractor, very poor maintenance, badly managed...
Stay somewhere else...
reviews.title: Still in construction but already shabby

owner_response.text:
Dear Tommel_E83

Thank you for your feedback sir, we do apoligise for the inconvenience that you had experience, it is our job to improve all the services & facilities in our hotel. We hope that we can provide you with a better treatment on your next visit.

Regards

Astara Hotel Balikpapan
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: I stayed here for a night during my travel to Balikpapan. the hotel is well located, not too far from the airport and from the city center. I love the room as it was very comfortable, and the pool is fun. they have huge waterpark inside the hotel. the breakfast was delicious and they have a lot of variety. the only lacking during my stay was the staffs, they are really slow. maybe because it was at the weekend so there were a lot of people.
reviews.title: Comfort room, nice pool

owner_response.text:
Dear Mrs RizkaRie

Thank you for your feedback mam, we are glad that you had a wonderful experience on your previous stay, it is our job to keep improving all the services & facilities in our hotel. We hope that we can provide you with more better services on your next visit.

Regards

Astara Hotel Balikpapan
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: Not a bad hotel with large clean and comfortable rooms. Restaurant food and service is average. Location is the main benefit staying here. Close to shops, restaurants and the Heart of Borneo pub. Currently busy constructing a water park at the pool area.
reviews.title: Good location

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr Julian H

Thank you for your feedback sir, we are glad that you had a wonderful experience on your previous stay, it is our job to keep improving all the services & facilities in our hotel. We hope that we can provide you with more better services on your next visit. and for your information our consctruction at the water park is finished.

Regards

Astara Hotel Balikpapan
owner_response.title: Owner Response

name: OYO 2015 Bandara Hotel Balikpapan
address: 1, Jalan Marsma Iswahyudi No 26. Gn. Bahagia, Balikpapan 76114 Indonesia

reviews.text:
Sy pilih hotel ini utk transit sblm melanjutkan perjalanan dgn pesawat. Transit utk 7 jam saja. Review yg sy lihat memang kondisinya mengecewakan, dan itu benar saat spt sy menginap kemarin. Tidak ada handuk, tidak ada remote AC, tidak ada remote TV. Karena kelelahan, sy jd tidak bisa atur suhu AC di kamar, alhasil kedinginan sepanjang istirahat.
Tidak ada air hangat. Dan sy tebak kamar yg sy tinggalin belum pernah ditinggalin. Saat sy buka kran air, yg pertama keluar airnya berwarna coklat (mungkin krn tidak pernah dipakai). Kondisi kamar mandi jg mengecewakan. Utk kamar standar ekonomi memang tidak bisa dijadikan utk tempat tinggal yg nyaman. Beruntung sy hanya 7 jam saja disana.
reviews.title: Review utk kamar standar ekonomi

name: OYO 1007 Alletha Guest House 2
address: Jl, Sumber Rejo 2 No10, Sumber Rejo Near Balikpapan Tengah, Balikpapan 76124 Indonesia

reviews.text:
Lokasi di sumber rejo 2. Agak berbeda sesikit dengan di google maps. Harga di kisaran 100 ribuan. Tempat chek in di lantai atas. Fasilitas AC, tempat tidur nyaman, air panas dgn shower, peralatan mandi, handuk.
Tidak ada meja
reviews.title: Penginapan murah di Balikpapan

name: OYO 1647 Hotel Pavilliun 02 Syariah
address: Jl. Adil Makmur No.9 Near Inpres Market, Balikpapan 76123 Indonesia

reviews.text:
Lokasi cukup strategis dekat di belakang pusat perbelanjaan kebun sayur, Balikpapan. Ada lift, kamar kecil tidak ada jendela. Fasilitas AC, tempat tidur nyaman, air panas dengan shower. Meja. Tidak ada handuk dan peralatan mandi.
Dapat harga di traveloka sekitar 120 ribuan.
reviews.title: Penginapan murah di Kebun Sayur Balikpapan

name: OYO 754 Nur Aziziah Guest House
address: Jl. Tembus Strat II, Gn. Samarinda, Balikpapan 76124 Indonesia

reviews.text:
Salah satu penginapan murah di Balikpapan namun berkesan. Dapat harga terbaik di traveloka hanya 82 ribu rupiah.
Fasilitas kamar yang luas, tempat tidur yang nyaman, AC, air panas dengan shower, peralatan mandi, handuk bersih. Dapat air mineral. Proses chek in mudah dan ramah. Ada tempat makan buat sarapan ,makan siang dan ngopi. 
Dekat dengan langgar. Lokasi di pinggir jalan. Suasana yang rindang. Jumlah kamar lebih dari 100 buah.
Klo malam ada tukang bakso mampir.
Rekomendasi deh.
reviews.title: Penginapan murah tapi nyaman di Balikpapan

name: OYO 1125 Sani Guest House
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
address: Jl Perum Sosial No.RT 28 Near Balikpapan Utara, Balikpapan 76125 Indonesia

reviews.text: budget hotel with clean room and nice services, warm welcome from the staf its also near with minimarket and bus station, easy to find food u can try cocom. there is also a couple sightseeing near this place like Mahavihara Buddhamanggala
reviews.title: great budget hotel

reviews.text:
Lokasi di batu ampar, tidak jauh dari RSUD Balikpapan. Kurang dari 1 Km.
Fasilitas AC, tempat tidur nyaman. Ada air panas dgn shower. Peralatan mandi.
Harga di kisaran 100 ribuan.
Berada di pemukiman warga.
reviews.title: Penginapan murah dekat RSUD Balikpapan

name: Sepinggan Hotel
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
address: Jln. Marsma Iswahyadi No. 60, Balikpapan 76115 Indonesia

reviews.text: The staff is very nice. Very helpful. The location is perfect for who need a transit flight. The room is average. Breakfast is also average. The hotel is far away if you want to find street food or restaurant. Nothing more you can expect for rp 250.000â€™s hotel rate.
reviews.title: Perfect location to airport

reviews.text: I can only recommend this hotel for the location, as it is very close to the airport. The room itself it's ok but the bed sheets were not clean. The bathroom definitely needs improvement. The breakfast was terrible, they could not careless about my dietary requirements, I am vegan.
reviews.title: Good for one night

reviews.text: Very bad room facilities and I'm very disappointing. Such as: no cupboard, no bed headboards, broken bathroom lamp, only left side sandals (both), broken bathroom door, old furniture, unclean pillowcase, bad road access, bad front yard hotel
reviews.title: Very bad

reviews.text:
i recommended this hotel for the location, very close with the sepinggan airport. it lenghts about 200 metres from the airport. and all foods provided are nice. i don't regret to spend some money to order some food in a restaurant. especially for the premium coffee and nasi goreng nanas, its a very good taste. 
the service staff are all friendly, nice and always give smile. it makes me feel comfort and calm.
reviews.title: very close with teh airport, good service!

reviews.text:
Hotel yg dekat dengan bandara hanya sekitar 600M depan bandara.
Kamar yg cukup luas, dan hotel bernuansa islami.
Untuk fasilitas kamar agak kurang,walaupun luas, ac tidak begitu dingin, mineral water sangat kecil, dan TV belum LED tapi sudah pakai parabola.
Kamar mandi besar ada bedtub nya.
Air panas nya menyala nyaman untuk berendam tapi air sedikit kuning.
Hotel terjangkau lumayan untuk singgah menunggu penerbangan
reviews.title: Semalam di Sepinggan

reviews.text: Kamarnya cukup nyaman, kamar mandi ada bathtub nya. Air kamar mandinya juga hangatnya pas. Disediakan fasilitas memesan makanan disertai price list, disediakan sajadah jadi tetap nyaman saat ingin beribadah. Staf ramah dan ada layanan antar jemput ke bandara gratis.
reviews.title: Hotel Transit

reviews.text:
Hotel ini di referensikan oleh teman saya ketika berkunjung ke Bontang, letaknya yang strategis dekat dengan bandara dan harganya yg ekonomis pas bagi saya bermalam satu hari saja, pertama datang dengan pelayanan yang ramah dan menawarkan shuttle gratis ke bandara maksimal sampai pukul 12:00 waktu setempat.

kamar deluxe yang luas dengan bathtube ditambah disediakan sajadah membantu saya beribadah namun wifi tidak bisa di akses baik dikamar atau lobby hotel. Untuk harga makanan disini terjangkau dan jauh dari kesan mahal.
reviews.title: Hotel dekat bandara

reviews.text: Kami sekeluarga merasa senang mendapatkan pelayanan dari hotel saat berbuka puasa kami sekeluarga mendapatkan free tajilan dan bisa merasakan paket berbuka yang murah hanya 18 rb seporsi asikkk. Dan saat kami mau check out ternyata kami dapat antaran gratis kebetulan kami membawa barang yang banyak dan gratiss pula. Terima kasihhhh
reviews.title: Senang bisa menginap dihotel sepinggan

name: Hotel Tirta
address: Jl. A Yani No.8, Balikpapan Indonesia

name: Hotel Budiman
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
address: Jln. Jendral Ahmad Yani No. 34, Balikpapan 76113 Indonesia

reviews.text: Kamar di lantai 1 yang bangunan baru modelnya modern, lebih bagus dari kamar bangunan lama, walaupun yang bangunan lama lebih luas di dalam kamarnya ada ruang tamu. Di lantai 2 kurang sreg sama kamarnya, berkesan tidak terurus
reviews.title: ulasan kamar

reviews.text: Begitu memasuki kamar, terasa lembab dan bau sedikit apek, kalau malam kadang terdengar suara berdecit, sarapan juga minimalis dan itu itu saja, pelayanan biasa, kelebihannya, dekat dengan Mall, bersisian dengan Pizza Hut dan minimarket serta travel Kangguru yang melayani transport antar kota.
reviews.title: Pilihan Budgeter

name: Hotel Pacific
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
address: Jl. Jenderal Ahmad Yani, No. 33 Gunungsari Ilir, Balikpapan 76121 Indonesia

reviews.text:
Walk in to this hotel last night after business meeting in Balikpapan. Paying 750,000 Rph 1 night stay inclusive with breakfast. 
Hygiene is poor and ridiculuos, never experience such bad smell pillow , mattress , sofa in a 3 star hotel before . I guess the hotel has no interest in hospitality or management dont care what is accomodation. 
The whole night no internet connection . DM response IT not around and she can't reset router. Most of the electric plug is not usable. Electric wire is everywhere behind the bed side table , and can't charge.  The only appreciation is the restaurant staff , is very helpful and friendly.
reviews.title: Terrible 3 Star Hotel - Hygiene Poor

reviews.text: Last week I stayed here. The breakfast is quite good, the rooms are clean, the staff are friendly and helpful. The location is strategic, near several ATM machines and near a pharmacy that is open 24 hours so I can easily find hand sanitizers and masks. At night, there are several culinary options that can be an alternative to having dinner outside the hotel, so I can save more on my business trip costs. I will consider staying at this hotel again when I have a business trip to Balikpapan.
reviews.title: Strategic location with a good service

reviews.text:
This hotel is a great hotel even though it's not a fancy, expensive hotel. It's located perfectly. You can visit many places in Balikpapan from this hotel.

The basement parking area is spacious. Once you got in to the lobby, You can check in to the great staff and get a card. The card is the key too your room. It's also an access tool to enable the elevator to go to upper floors. So if you ordered something online (food, drink etc.) your delivery guy cannot come up to your room since you need a card to access the upper floors. The room itself is nice. You get a really clean room and bathroom. Breakfast there is awesome, you get good food and service from the staff. The wifi quality is not that great. You can't even watch a YouTube video on great quality. On the opposite side of the hotel is a mosque. It could be noisy around 6 P.M but a great feature for muslims.

Overall, it's a great hotel. You get good food, good service and clean rooms if you decided to check in to the hotel.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text:
This is an old local hotel in Balikpapan but surprisingly been managed so well and competeable with other new hotel chains. Located very strategic in the heart of Balikpapan, easy access to shopping centre, hospital, govt office, etc.

Staffs hotels are polite and friendly, helpfull, the room is so homy, bathub in every room I guess, very clean, and stable hot water.The breakfast is average, but I loved the restauran, price for dinner or lunch is reasonable. 

The meeting room is also very neat with tasty coffee break. Overall, loved it.
reviews.title: Well maintenanced Hotel

reviews.text: This hotel is always our first priority if we stayed at Balikpapan. Clean room and cozy. Have bath up in bathroom and clean too. Average price from 25-30$ per nights for standart or superior room.For staying until 2 days this is great place. Price inlude breakfast and breakfast is good enough
reviews.title: Temporary Hotel for 1 or 2 days

reviews.text:
for a budget, this hotel was quite good deals. albeit looking old, all the room amenities work fine. yes we had to complaint about the A/C that kept spraying water to us, other than that, we had pleasant stay.

the staffs were helpful, and you could find a lot of food stalls around hotel especially at night. one big plus for me was the hotel located right in front of a big mosque so praying won't be a problem for muslim traveller staying on friday like me.

the internet was, poor, very poor. and the breakfast menu was what you can expect from a budget hotel
reviews.title: cheap hotel with poor internet

reviews.text: We stayed with family booked for 4 rooms. The hotel is average but ok. The bathroom looks old the grouting looks horrible. The bfast for this economy hotel is ok. The Staff on the floor we asked to clear the finish in our room nothing happened. Overall is average.
reviews.title: Average Hotel

reviews.text:
Stayed here on business for a week. The hotel check in was smooth and fast. The rooms are clean and bed was comfortable. 

There was only one plug point in the room and it was not working at first. I had to get down to the main plug and change connection to make it work. 

The internet only worked 25% of time. When complained they said "we will ask engineer to check". But nothing happened. I made call and went to reception many a times asking them to fix it. But they did not do it.

The breakfast options were not good.no juices available. Omlettes were not hot and hot milk was not available for tea. Only pan cakes were available which u found was ok.
reviews.title: Average hotel, Internet & Breakfast poor

reviews.text: Large room. Cleanliness is average. Bathroom has bathtub with clean water. Most TV signals are clear. There's no safety box inside the room and also there's no hairdryer. Breakfast was somewhat variety but the taste is average. Its location is somewhat good.
reviews.title: Okay if you could find cheap

reviews.text:
Stayed here for the first time in 2011, now coming back here because of the affordable rate and worth the price facilities.

The room is clean and comfy, the bathroom has a bathtub which is a plus value remind the same rate hotels only provide standing shower. Hot water is good. 

Furnitures isnt that shiny but remind the price it's still OK. Breakfast needs more variation. They only provide carbs. Fried rice, fried noodle, dice potatoes, chicken porridge, cereal, and toast. No veggies, meat is only opor ayam. Which doesnt match to any of that carbs mentioned above.

Check in and check out process is fast, wifi is terrible. It has full signal but it keeps connect and disconnect continously.
reviews.title: An OK hotel

reviews.text: Have to wait about 45 minutes to check in, breakfast was so so. Room was ok. Clean, AC work perfectly, limited tv channel, bath room quite large with bathtub. Located in city center, 10 minutes walk to balikpapan plaza. Worth with the price you pay.
reviews.title: Ordinary hotel

reviews.text: I have a very good time stay in Pacific Hotel Balikpapan. The location is central city. Rooms is good and clean. I can use the bathtub, and the shower also nice with hot water. I can also receive good connection of fast free wifi inside the rooms. I try for streaming and it works very well. The staff doing a good welcoming hospitality and kind. Take a good enough breakfast in the morning. I wake up in the morning and try fitness faicilities closed to the park and enjoy myself. I think Hotel Pacific is a good choice when visiting Balikpapan. I recommended this place for you all.
reviews.title: Central Location Good Services

reviews.text: The food is good, friendly staff, but the building it self is old. I stay at 8th floor, the floor it self feels dusty. And the teaspoon sticky. The only thing that's keep me here are the wifi, it's pretty fast, it's close to Plaza Balikpapan Mall, and there is local food around this hotel . Overall it's an "Ok"
reviews.title: An "Ok" Hotel

reviews.text: need to wait for around 30 minutes for receptionist to check my booked room. great design for lobby. location near mall, breakfast and staff hospitality is good. medium room is too small for two people in my opinion.
reviews.title: average hotel

reviews.text:
I live in this hotel in 2nd floor for one week
In this one week i can say the room is quite clean and hotel staff are friendly the laundry service was great but i really hate the wifi because it really hard to connect. 

It doesn't stop in bad wifi connection, i have bad experience in cable tv. The picture of my like a broken dvd movie that continuously stopped.

I thought i don't wanna go back to this hotel if i have to pay myself
reviews.title: Bad wifi bad tv cable

reviews.text:
Moved from Jakarta to Balikpapan and spent about 2 weeks here before find a house.
Large hotel room, wooden floor which is good, large dining room, and also good gym.

Breakfast food really good, dinner menu also good (a bit expensive). The 'sop buntut' made my cholesterol increase. So gym is my favorite room after that.

Strategic location: 
Big Mosque in front of hotel 
About 10 minutes walk to Balikpapan Plaza (Shopping Centre)
Less than 5 minutes walk to Restu Ibu hospital
reviews.title: Very Good Location

reviews.text: Nice and clean hotel with reasonable price. Near baikpapan plaza only need to take one trip public transportation or just walk if you want to. Quite a lot souvenir also food shop to stop you. This hotel also have a quite big masjid in the opposite of the road
reviews.title: Nice clean and neat hotel

reviews.text: Room good :clean comfort city view,toilet good,hot water good,internet excellent.streaming without buffering.tv station good,access good,fast check in,breakfast varian good,over all comfort,good.recommendate for backpacker.
reviews.title: Good

reviews.text: Standardized room, but not every electrical plug functions well. The most interesting thing about this place is the location. There are many "warung" or local restaurants that serve fresh fish, deep fried or grilled depends on our appetite.
reviews.title: Culinary tourism

reviews.text:
I chose this hotel because of its location. It is not too near to the shopping area but not bad if you want to get some local shopping place. I got a bit tired at that day so I chose this hotel because it has available room for me. 

Checking in was smooth and I love the hospitality. The room is not too spacious but it is enough. The shower is powerful and even I found a bath tub in my room which is worth of the money I spent. 

They also serve the early breakfast they provided for my fasting as I was traveling in Ramadan. It has various menu and all of them were so delicious. 

I think that this hotel is a good choice for staying one night and to relax for a while apart from its location.
reviews.title: Not bad for one night staying

name: Royal Suite Hotel Balikpapan
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
address: Jl. Syarifuddin Yoes No. 125, Sepinggan, Balikpapan 76115 Indonesia

reviews.text:
The hotel was poorly managed. No elevator. The room was dirty and smelly, the bathroom was moldy. Breakfast was poor. Definitely will not come back to stay in this hotel. 

Only the location is good, 5 minutes to airport.
reviews.title: Worst

reviews.text: Good location near Bpn airport but hotel is poorly maintained. Mattress was in bad condition - sagging and too soft to have a proper rest. Room was poorly lighted and "smelly". For me, hardly has good rest.
reviews.title: Stay at Royal Suite Hotel

reviews.text:
This is a very comfortable hotel. I have stayed for 3 nights. The place is very quiet, the view from the inside of the room is also very good. Around the hotel is full of green plants.

Cleanliness in the room is very well preserved. Hot water also works normally.

For breakfast, not too many choices, but the taste is very, very tasty.
reviews.title: Green Hotel

reviews.text:
I travel quite often to Balikpapan, so a good hotel for rest is a must for me. When I heard a new hotel open near the Airport, I can't wait to give it a try and lucky for me it pays of. From check in everything went smoothly, room is very spacious with complete amenities and to my surprise they even provide a body pillow, instantly I feels like home.

Sleeping quality was great, breakfast menu is good. There are some works in progress but when its finished I am sure will compliment the already great services to the hotel.
reviews.title: Great Hotel in Progress

reviews.text:
Hotel TERBURUK

Saya check in jam 1 siang, live music sedang berlangsung. Kemudian saya masuk kamar, ternyata musiknya masih terdengar keras, saya pun merasa terganggu ketika shalat, kemudian ada surat edaran yang isinya management meminta maaf karena berisik, dan acara musik itu dari 18:00 hingga 00:00. Karena saya merasa kecewa, saya belum sampai 1 jam berada di kamar, saya telpon receptionist untuk komplain dan meminta refund. Percuma juga kan stay di hotel yang tidak bisa digunakan untuk beristirahat. Namun permintaan refund ditolak, dan bila saya ingin segera check-out maka dikenakan charge 300rb. Lucu juga, saya udah keluar biaya taxi untuk sampai ke hotel, namun hotelnya tidak berfungsi sebagai hotel, bukannya ditawarkan ganti rugi malah dikenakan charge 300rb. Saya minta bicara dengan managernya, eh managernya libur karena hari minggu.

Di hotel ini juga tidak ada lift, jadi saya harus angkat tas saya yang beratnya 20kg melalui anak tangga. Koridor tidak rapi, seperti renovasi yang mangkrak. Di dalam kamarpun berdebu.

Pengalaman yang sangat mengecewakan!
reviews.title: TERBURUK

reviews.text:
Awalnya ragu krn nampak kecil terlihat dari depan, tapi saat saya masuk trnyata lobbynya bagus dan bersih. Staffnya ramah dan sarapannya pun lumayan memuaskan dgn restoran yang ckup baik. 
Recomended hotel lah utk budget sedang
reviews.title: Good hotel

reviews.text: Saya menginap semalam dari tanggal 5 Jan 2018 dalam rangka liburan keluarga di kamar 215 dan 216. Secara keseluruhan baik pelayanan, makanan, kebersihan dan kenyamanan memuaskan walaupun perlu mendapat perhatian dibeberapa bagian seperti tidak berfungsi nya penutup bathtub serta wastafel karena rusak padahal hotelnya masih termasuk baru serta kami sekeluarga kurang seberapa suka dengan wangi parfum yang digunakan untuk kamar dan kamar mandi. Tapi secara keseluruhan menyenangkan dan memuaskan.
reviews.title: Memuaskan

reviews.text: Kesan pertama masuk ke lobi Suasana hotel rasanya bintang 4 karena nyaman. Begitu masuk ke dalam ruang kamar ternyata ada yg tidak sedap, trnyata karpetnya kurang bersih jadi kami meminta petugas untuk menambah pewangi ruangan. Overall is good...
reviews.title: Hotel bintang 3 rasa bintang 4

name: Mutiara Indah Hotel
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
address: Jl. Mayjen Sutoyo No. 65, Balikpapan Indonesia

reviews.text:
I stayed in this hotel for 5 days and 4 nights. Altogether the stay in the hotel was nice and the price, after a bit of negotiation, was fair. Some things were very nice but some things also were kind of a setback, that is why altogether it is just average. Renovation of bathrooms and upgrading the aircons would definitely lead to a better judgement.
The location of the hotel is somewhat remote from malls and the center of the town, taking a taxi or a local van is necessary but easy and affordable to do.
The room is huge and nicely decorated with a desk and a modern television. The bed is nice, sheets are clean. The aircon is too small and too old though, to keep the room cool. In my case it had to work day and night and still it was not really cool enough at times when it was hot in the day.
The bathroom is a bit of a disappointment, old and somewhat smelly, without a shower curtain. Provided soaps are nice but toilet, shower and sink are very old. Bathroom definitely needs renovation. 
The breakfast is nice. Served in the nice restaurant with a small buffet with abundant local food, several dishes to choose from as well as bread and marmelade for the "buleh" type of visitors. Maybe something could be done about the coffee though. Just serving coffee powder (no not instant coffee but real coffee powder) to " prepare" a cup of coffee is somewhat too primitive for a hotel that aims to have a certain quality standard. 
Personnel in the reception, cleaning and restaurant I experienced as somewhat slow but certainly serviceable, friendly and polite.
reviews.title: a bit far but huge rooms and fair breakfast

reviews.text: Hotel sangat terjangkau rate kamarnya,  kamar luas saya sangat puas dengan rate kamar standard dan kamar yg di dapat luas cuma memang agak sepi ya pengunjungnya.. Tapi recomended bagi yang punya budget terbatas tempat sangat nyaman

reviews.text: I Stayed 3 nights here in their superior room. Despite the great walking distance to shopping area and down town,but the room service and the front office need to be more polite and must study how to handle guest with emphaty....but anyway not bad for just less than a week.
reviews.title: service need more training

reviews.text:
Stayed 2 nights here in their superior room. Despite the great walking distance to shopping center, the hotel staffs are quite paranoid with guests running away from the hotel without paying. I already paid almost double the amount of money for so call "Deposit" yet I was getting called on the phone at 10.40pm and they even sent a guy to knock on my door checking whether the guest is in the room or not.

What make the matter worse, after checking out the hotel called me on the mobile asking about a snack that I consumed from their minibar...can't they bother to check first whether the snacks belongs to the hotel or not, before calling the guest?

For 400.000 / Night in this paranoid hotel, I would rather spend elsewhere.
reviews.title: Great Location but Paranoid Staffs

reviews.text:
Nama besar, chain hotel, low rate, dan termasuk hotel legendaris di balikpapan menjadi alasan utk menginap di mirama balikpapan. Luas kamar standard cukup untuk single occupancy. Kebersihan rata-rata. Big led tv dengan banyaknya premium channel. Ada deposit rp. 50 ribu yang dikembalikan saat check out. Parkir luas. Lokasi pusat kota. Hot water bagus.
Mengambil standard room dimana view jendela adalah koridor antar kamar dan ditutup roller blind sehingga masih ada sisi yang terlihat dari koridor (no privacy). Ambience kamar seperti karaoke room. Bathroom Exhaust fan tidak aktif. Karena kamar berada di tengah bangunan maka sinyal handphone lemah, mencoba free wifi pun lemah. Tidak kedap suara mungkin karena ada bagian dinding yang bukan dari tembok semen. Saat check out pukul 4.30 turun dari kamar lantai 3 ke reception lantai 1 hendak menggunakan lift rupanya tidak berfungsi sehingga turun lengkap membawa tas dengan tangga.  dengan direnovasi hanya tak seperti yang diharapkan. Untuk hotel dengan nama besar ini sangat disayangkan, tidak direkomendasikan.
reviews.title: Hotel legendaris yang telah renta.

reviews.text:
Pesan kamar yg Executive Room cuma dengan 500rb. Plus deposit 400rb yg akan dibalikkan saat checkout. G dapat nih di hotel lain kamar executive 500rb :P
Kamar mandi luas, toiletries lengkap, tapi air warna kuning -_-" kelihatan saat ngisi bath up dan air panasnya agak lama
Kesini sekeluarga rame2 jadi tambah kasur tambahan 150rb. Tapi kasurnya tambahannya g bagus. G enak ditidurin. 
Wifinya kencang (t.o.p)

Pizza Hut restaurant is right beside the hotel, many street foods around. You can reach Plaza Balikpapan only 10minutes by walking. reviews.text:
Booked the hotel through online and didn't expected much after read all those comments here.

+ points : 1 The lobby is huge and nice.
                2 Room is spacious, good for family. 
                3 Bed is big
                4 Wifi connection is good
                5 Reception were attentive even though were not too fast.
                6 Located at the heart of the city

- Points : 1 Elevator is too old, need to fix.
               2 Bathrooms need to clean thoroughly.
               3 Please put the bath cubicle door back

after all, it was such a good experience to stay in the oldest hotel in Balikpapan, i guessed you can do better becos there are many people want to stay just want to feel the atmosphere of once the best hotel in town.

reviews.text:
I missed my flight connection in Balikpapan and I needed a hotel for a night. Balikpapan offered rooms for a reasonable price or at least more reasonable than the other ones in the centre and the room even had a window that I could open.
The room was really old, all the furniture, carpet, bathroom, everything, as if no one has touched it in the last thirty years. The bed was comfortable, having a Western style bathroom after many mandis was refreshing. The staff was also friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Old-school hotel, with old rooms, but alright for a night

reviews.text: We stayed 3 nights and enjoyed it very much: A really big clean swimming-pool, great breakfast with omelet, very friendly staff, shoppingmall and beach-restaurants in walking-distance, travel-agency in the hotel, very good price-value-relation!
reviews.title: Great Value

reviews.text:
Terrible unfortunately. I know this hotel is under renovation and most of the hotel is being completed (maybe by mid 2012) but the standard of the existing available rooms s terrible.

The first impression I had of the hotel was a good one as the foyer and lobby are very grand looking and clean, the staff were very helpful and accommodating as well. However that all changed when I entered my room, I had a deluxe room (king sized bed) and found it to be very dirty. There were maggots crawling out from under my bedside table and someone had dropped a packet of food down there which was covered in them. There were cigarette butts in the ashtray even though I was told it was a none smoking room. I asked to change rooms which after I had to show the manager why he agreed. My new room was not much better, still bits of rubbish on the floor and hairs in the shower and also in my bed which told me they hadn't changed the sheets since the last occupants. My shower had no screen or curtain and as a result the toilet and bathroom floor were covered in water after a shower. 
The paint was falling off the walls, the TV had very bad reception, the air-conditioner worked part time and the internet was (when it was working) at dial-up speed, the linen was old and had holes in it, the rooms smelt musty and dirty. There were many other issues with the room but these were definitely the worst.
The hotel advertises several restaurants but they are not open, the main restaurant is only open for breakfast otherwise you have to eat in the cafe which has a very limited menu. There is a pizza hut attached to the hotel and it is only about a five minute walk to a large shopping centre which has plenty of food establishments and shops.
Overall, the only thing this hotel has going for it presently is it's location, although for about $20 extra a night, you can get a better location and a proper four star hotel, which is where I am staying now as I had to move out.
There are much better places to stay in Balikpapan and for very little extra money, so until the renovations are finished and hopefully better cleaning staff, I would stay away from this place
reviews.title: Beware - Needs a lot of work, definitely not four stars!

reviews.text:
Hotel yang begitu redup saat masuk,
Kamar hotel juga kurang bersih,
Kamar mandi yang sudah tidak layak.
Breakfast tidak sesuai dengan standard bintangnya.
Kolam renang yang sangat tidak terawat (berlumut),akses jalan ke kolam renang yang sangat tidak representative,licin & kotor
Sangat disayangkan karena dahulu sempat sebagai salah satu ikon Balikpapan & saat sekarang Balikpapan sangat berkembang tetapi hotel ini begitu tidak terawat

reviews.text:
PegiPegi.com menawarkan promo paket kamar dengan harga yang dibawah rata-rata saat itu serta gambar kamar hotel yang modern dan menarik. 
Kenyataannya saat saya datang, kamar hotel tidak sesuai. jendela kamar hotel terbuka, sisa mau nikotin (asap rokok) masih dapat tercium. WIFI tidak bekerja, kamar mandi basah meluber tidak ada keset kaki. 
Lebih parah lift macet! Sehingga turun ke lantai 1 lewat tangga darurat. Saya hanya stay 1 malam saja dan kapok. PegiPegi.com tolong crosscheck dahulu.
reviews.title: Gambar Tidak Sesuai Dengan Kondisi Hotel

reviews.text:
Kamar tidak sesuai seperti yang di gambar hotel, utk kamar deluxe di gambar harusnya ada sofa, tp ternyata tidak ada..
Service/pelayanan buruk terutama saat mau check in tidak ramah.. banyak debu, sprei dan bantal ada noda dan warnanya kuning, karpet kotor, kaca kotor, kamar mandi kotor, karpetnya dekil.. handuk tidak langsung tersedia.. 
Wifi lemot, dan baru dipasang saat kami masuk kamar..

reviews.text: Pd tgl 22 des s/d 27 des'16 saya ada boking 2 kmr di benakutai dan dihargai sebesar rp.4juta. Jd perhari rp.400 rb tanpa breakfast. Setelah saya lihat kondisi hotelnya sangat mengecewakan. Kmrnya agak kotor dan spreinya agak bau. Krn itu saya batalkan pesanan saya. Saya pindah ke hotel pacific yg letaknya tidak begitu jauh dgn hotel benakutai. Dgn harga rp. 430 ribu include breakfast. Hotelnya sangat nyaman dan bersih, sangat jauh dgn kondisi kmr dibenakutai. Tersedia juga antar jemput bandara tapi harus reservasi terlebih dahulu. Dan tidak usah khawatir tempat Makan banyak tersedia disekitar hotel misalnya pizzahut, depot mini, mantaw, depot queen

reviews.text: Lokasi hotel ini, sangatlah bagus. keluar sedikit sudah ketemu dengan Mall Balikpapan Plaza. Area Perbankan juga tidak jauh dari hotel itu. Pass sebelah hotel ada resto Pizza yang terkenal. Kamar sangat nyaman, bersih. Sarapannya pun juga bervariasi. Enak-enak..minta di antar ke Bandara, sopir nya baik hati. minta berhenti di tempat jual oleh-oleh, yha dilayani. tidak ada keluhan sama sekali. menginap di hotel ini, mending di hari weekend, dapet Diskon 50% dari publish rate.

reviews.text:
Hotel faforit saya waktu anak2 .sekarang  hotel lama karena tergilas jaman persaingam hotel di balikpapan cukup ketat.
Bagi saya culup  nyaman karena berada temgah  kota dan strategis dekat dgn mall .pusat perkantoran.hanya perlu dibenahi.segi kebersihan.mungkin peralatannya sudah lama.perlu diperbaharui.

reviews.text: Pertama kali menginap dihotel ini dikamar deluxe, menu sarapan paginya tidak menarik dan rasanya juga kurang enak. Kamar sudah tua dan bathtube tidak ada tutup nya jadi tidak bisa digunakan. Letak nya strategis ditengah kota.
reviews.title: Hotel Tua

reviews.text:
The new benakutai hotel merupakan hotel tertua di kota kelahiranku balikpapan. Tapi setelah melihat hotel benakutai yg sekarang sungguh jauh berbeda, jadi saya segera melangkahkan kaki kehotel ini dan kembali kepelukan kotaku.hotel ini terletak di tengah keramaian kota saya teringat saat pergi sekolah saya selalu melewati hotel ini karena sekolahan saya ada dulu berada di belakang hotel jadi memory saya. 
Saat masuk kelobby ada beberapa tempat yg berubah dan yg di pertahankan. 
Ukiran kayu ulin khas kalimantan selalu ada. 
Room hotel ini sangat luas dg fasilitas komplit hotel bintang jadi tidak usah bingung. 
Apalagi hotel ini dekat dengan mall dan juga pertokoan dan tdk jauh dari hotel kita bisa berjalan kepinggir laut unyuk menikmati udara laut dan makan sea food ala balikpapan.
Di hotel pun kita bisa rental mobil jika kita hendak bepergian jauh tapi jika jika tahu arah kita bisa menggunakan angkutan umum yg berjalan 24 jam jadi mudahkan
Benakutai aku akan kembali lagi 
Terimakasih untuk semua staf hotel yg sdh memberi pelayanan dg sangat baikâ€¦â€¦. Thanks
reviews.title: The amazing hotel

reviews.text: Baru saja saya keluar dari hotel ini siang tadi. Walau hanya satu malam menginap di sini, tapi cukup mengesankan. Asalnya adalah hotel Bena Kutai yang sudah lama berdiri di Kota Balikppapan, Kota Minyak. Banyak property digunakan yang cukup khas di Kalimantan yaitu penggunaan kayu untuk duduk-duduk santai. Waktu santai di sore hari setelah penat seharian mengikuti acara "meeting" sambil duduk di kayu, sambil diiringi dengan lantunan live musik. Cukup ramah pelantun lagunya. " Selamat sore mas-mas yang barusan masuk", sapanya. Langsung kami duduk santai menikmati lagu yang dibawakan. Di mejapun juga telah disediakan majalah yang dapat dibaca untjuk menambah wawasan tentang kota Balikapapan dan Kalimantan Timur pada umumnya. Kamarnya sangat luas dengan harga yang sangat terjangkau. Tidak salah jika anda berkunjung ke kalimantan Timur, menginap di Hotel New Benakutai.
reviews.title: Hotel Suasana baru
